1.title: Beginning

11113.content: Who is the creator of this new tech innovation?
11113.title: New Tech innovation

111132.content: Who else could experiment on MJ to become inhumanely pregnant?
111132.title: Unknown Villain/Hero?

choices: Mary Jane picks up the vial (RESERVED)
1111321.content:
Mary Jane Watson made her way through the busy city street, looking up as a looming tower came into view. Purple lettering reading Oscorp Industries ran up its front.

An anonymous source sent her an email to her Daily Bugle account, and she had to admit that it enticed her. The message said that the company was secretly developing something that could change the world. Knowing Oscorp, she wasn't sure if it was a change for the better or worse. Of course, she had to check it out. Though they had never done anything wrong, Mary Jane never fully trusted Norman.

Luckily for her, she was able to get into a tour of the facility, along with some high schoolers and children. Eventually, they reached the developmental labs.

"These are our laboratories. Our best and brightest scientists are hard at work building a better future!" the tour guide said.

Most of the laboratories could be seen through glass walls, but one lab had blinds covering the glass, making it impossible to see inside.

"It must be in there..." MJ muttered.

"What was that, miss?" the guide asked.

"Oh, I was just wondering what was in that lab," she replied.

"Ah...that's top secret," the tour guide said with a smile. "Now, do we have any more questions before we move on?"

Luckily for Mary Jane, there were plenty of questions, so she had time to check out her surroundings more. Suddenly, a scientist exited the lab, and the door locked behind him. He was walking her way. MJ spotted a key card on his belt, and saw that he was getting closer. She made her way to the outer ring of the tour group, closest to where the scientist was walking.

Finally, he got close to her, and she quickly swiped it from his side. He didn't notice, and walked away. The tour group had finished, and had begun to head further down the hallway, away from the closed-off lab.

Mary Jane broke from the group, and began to approach the door of the lab.

"Mary Jane Watson!"

MJ turned around, jolting after hearing her name. She tensed up when she saw who the voice belonged to.

Norman Osborn.

"How are you, my dear?" he asked.

"Mr. Osborn! I...I'm good. how are you?"

"Busy as always. What brings you to Oscorp?"

Mary Jane sighed. "I just...wanted to take another tour. For old time's sake."

"You're group's getting away from you," he said, nodding towards the group that was walking away.

"I had to use the restroom," she lied.

"Right. It feels just like yesterday when you, Harry, and Peter Parker took a field trip here. How is Peter, by the way?" he asked.

"Oh. We...broke up a few months ago, actually. I haven't spoken to him in a while. But he's...keeping busy, I'm sure," MJ explained.

Norman nodded. "Well, I'm sorry to hear that. I thought you two were good together."

"Yeah. We're both just really busy."

"I'm sure. Must be nice to work at the Bugle now that Jameson's off spouting conspiracy theories on his podcast," Osborn chuckled.

"It's a lot less stressful, that's for sure. How has Harry been? I haven't heard from him in a while."

Norman's eyes dropped, finally breaking contact with Mary Jane's gaze.

"He's keeping himself occupied. The work over in Europe for Oscorp has been a lot more than we originally thought. I'll let him know that you were asking about him. I know he misses you and Peter. Anyways, I've got places to be, people to see. I'm sure I'll see you around, Miss Watson," Norman said, heading in the direction that the group was going.

"See you later, Mr. Osborne!" MJ said.

She breathed a sigh of relief, happy to finally be alone. That was close. She swiped the keycard on the door's scanner, and it unlocked, allowing her to enter.

She was surprised at how sparse the lab was. there were some computers, but that was pretty much it. Except for the vial in the middle of the room. It was filled with a striking neon blue liquid.

"This? This is what's supposed to change the world?"
1111321.title: Into the game-verse...

11113211.content:
She approached the vial slowly, wary of the security in oscorp. She stood in front of the small pedestal on which it stood and looked at it. It shimmered blue and almost seemed to glow in the dim light of the lab.

“This is kinda underwhelming” she mused to herself, checking for any notes or details about the vial.

She walked over to the computers to see if she could find anything of use on them, but most of them were heavily encrypted and protected, beyond her hacking skill, and the ones that she could look around on had nothing useful, just notes about the conditions of the room or something.

She bent over to inspect the vial, and reached out her hand, gently grabbing it and pulling it towards her face to look at closer. She held it up to the light and looked at it from every angle to see if there was anything special about it, maybe some nanites, or some other complex science crap that was well beyond her knowledge. But all she could see was that it was a blue liquid.

Suddenly she heard the door start to open, the beeping of a card swiping at it to get inside. It startled her and she dropped the vial, smashing it on the pedestal and sending most of the liquid splashing onto her, soaking through her clothes. Before she had time to complain she ran to hide underneath a desk, praying that she wasn’t found.

“Thanks Bill, i swear i had it earlier” she heard a voice, assuming it was the man she ‘borrowed’ a card from.

“Aw what the hell!” The other voice exclaimed, noticing the smashed vial. “Mounting must have been unstable. That took weeks! We need to inform the others and get working on a new batch”

The two men left hurriedly, and MJ crawled out of her spot, dropping the card onto the desk and making her way out of the lab, slipping out the door and back into thw main atrium quickly. She rushed to the bathroom and attempted to dry her clothes, before giving up and making her way to the exit, hiding her wet shirt under her jacket.
11113211.title: Mary Jane picks up the vial

111132111.content:
Mary Jane hurried down the hallway corridor and pressed the elevator button. She was glad that nobody else was on it, and rode down to the ground floor. "Well, that was a bust..." she muttered to herself.

With a sigh, she left Oscorp and headed to the nearest subway station, returning to her apartment for the night.

Mary Jane's head began to spin as the subway started to move. It was almost as if she were suffering motion sickness, but she'd never had an issue with riding on the subway before.

She was lucky that she didn't live too far from Oscorp, and got off on the second stop. As she walked up the stairs to her apartment, a wave of nausea ran over her. MJ fiddled with the keys, trying to unlock it as fast as she could, and stumbled inside. She ran to the bathroom and vomited.

This was the first time she'd been sick in a while. Usually she tried to make sure that she was in tip top shape, so this was unlike her. Mary Jane flushed the toilet and wiped the sweat from her forehead.

"Ugh..." she moaned, her head hanging over the toilet.

"I think Peter got sick when he got bitten by that spider. Please don't tell me I spilled the liquid form of a radioactive spider bite on myself in the lab..." MJ grunted.


After nearly half an hour of vomiting, she finally felt good enough to stand, and headed to bed. As she fell asleep, her head was still spinning and it felt like her stomach was doing flips. With as miserable as she was feeling now, she desperately hoped she'd be better in the morning.
111132111.title: She heads home (RESERVED)

1111321111.content:
A few days later, and several hours of vomiting later, MJ had started to recover. She lay in bed, still feeling off, but better than before. She looked at her phone, qnd rubbed her temples, the bright screen giving her a headache. Checking the time she saw that she had time before she should head into work.

She got out of bed slowly, making her way to the kitchen to grab some breakfast, if she could keep it down. She grabbed an apple and a glass of smoothie, eating slowly to make sure she didn’t vomit. After eating she headed for the shower, taking her time under the hot water, tiredly washing herself. She stepped out and dried off, grabbing her clothes and getting dressed

“Gah, my boobs feel so weird” she moaned, as she put on her bra, which now felt like it was digging into her skin.

She finished dressing, although her bra was still irritating her and it felt like her shirt had shrunk. As she left her apartment she felt her stomach rumbling, and stopped at the nearest coffee shop to her, buying a muffin amd a box of donuts, chowing down on them on her way to work, still feeling a little hungry when she finished.

— — — -

Throughout her day at work she was nursing a headache, and worked through her projects slowly. When the office began to empty, she started to work on a side project, to find out what the liquid she found at oscorp.

After searching for what seemed like hours she found next to nothing on it, save for that it was a secret project, which she already knew, and that it wasn’t easily weaponised, which surprised her for sure.

“Oscorp have a track record for military contracts, so this is new” she said to herself, noting it down.

Before long she began to grow tired and signed out, heading home after what felt like the longest day of work. As she sat on the subway, her stomach grumbled loudly and she looked up, embarassed. She pulled out her phone and placed an order for two large pizzas to be at her apartment before she got back.
1111321111.title: Continue (RESERVED)

11113211111.content:
Mary Jane was awoken by her alarm clock going off, over an hour earlier than when she had woken up the previous day. She liked to go the gym a few blocks away two or three times a week. Since she had missed out going earlier because of her illness, she made sure that she wouldn't miss out today.

She quickly changed into her regular workout attire, which were leggings and a spots top. MJ pulled the leggings up, her hand running along her thin yet fit butt, and was pleased that her top showed off her toned midsection. She smiled, happy that her bout with whatever she was sick with didn't have much of an effect on her.

The walk to the gym was brief, and Mary Jane always loved the cool morning air of New York, even if she knew it would heat up as the day went on.

At the gym, she went through her usual workout. First, were squats. They went fine, but she did notice that she had much less energy than usual. And she picked up a sweat faster than normal, too.

After a few more exercises, MJ jogged on the treadmill for about half an hour. Again, the fatigue hit her much quicker than she was used to.

Deciding to call it quits a few minutes early, she got showered and changed into her work clothes. As she got dressed, her stomach groaned and gurgled, nausea hitting her once more.

She ducked into an empty stall and vomited.

"Ugh...I thought I was finally past it..." she moaned under her breath.

After making sure she was finished, Mary Jane headed to the Daily Bugle, vowing not to let her nausea get the best of her. On the way, she picked up some bagels for herself, surprised that she was hungry after being so sick not even ten minutes earlier.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

At the Bugle, MJ sat at her desk, looking at the emails on her computer for any possible leads to follow. Betty Brant, the secretary, approached the desk with a smile on her face.

"Hey, MJ! I didn't have a chance to ask you yesterday. Are you feeling any better? You usually never take off work," she noted.

"Oh, thanks. I'm doing a lot better," Mary Jane replied.

"Good! So, Robbie wanted me to tell you about a possible article for you to write," Betty handed her a press release and walked way.

Mary Jane grabbed the sheet of paper and read over it. Apparently, Oscorp had just struck a deal with the NYC government to set up research stations throughout the city. They would monitor air, water, and electrical statuses all around New York, ensuring that they worked to the best of their abilities. According to the release, the stations were to be managed by Harry.

"Harry, I have no idea how Norman could be your father," she said to herself.

With a sigh, she began to write the article.
11113211111.title: The next day (RESERVED)

choices: Go see Aunt May after work (RESERVED)
111132111111.content:
After a few tedious hours of writing, MJ had a look at the time, and was relieved to find that it was time for her to go. She packed up her stuff from her desk and made her way to the door.

“See you tomorrow Betty” she said, smiling and waving at her co-worker.

She smiled back and waved. “See you, have a good night!” She added.

MJ made her way to the subway, feeling strangely exhausted from work, and even stranger, she felt starving, her stomach grumbling loudly in the packed station. As she stepped onto the train she added to her grocery list, making sure she had a lot more food to buy.

When she got back to her apartment, she dropped her stuff and got straight to cooking herself some dinner, deciding on pasta, cooking all that she could find in her apartment. She wolfed it down hungrily, baffled at how she could stand her appalling cooking.

After eating she ambled her way to bed, tired from work, and full from her very large meal.

— — — -

MJ woke up groggily. She sat up, and slowly opened her eyes, before swinging round and sitting on the edge of her bed. She felt her stomach start to grumble and groan, and immediately lunged towards the bathroom, retching into the toilet.

“Must have eaten way too much last night” she groaned, waiting for another round to come.

When another bout failed to come, she stood up and started to wash her face off. She looked in the mirror and her face changed from tiredness to confusion. She backed up and then looked at herself straight on, then turned to the side and then back again.

“Are my boobs bigger?” She wondered, cupping them in her hands and inspecting them slowly. They felt tighter and sorer, and looked like they were bulging out of her shirt.

She got dressed, still concious of her new bust, which made her bra and her shirt feel way too tight for her comfort. Her pants felt tight as well, the buttons feeling constricting on her hips. She sighed and put on her jacket, grabbing her stuff and leaving. On her way to work she grabbed some breakfast from a coffee shop, her stomach grumbling through it all.

— — — -

MJ walked into the office and waved to a few people as she made her way to her desk. She sat down and began to start working, finishing up the article on the new Oscorp research stations.

“Hey MJ, meeting in five minutes” Betty called to her as she walked by.

“Right, thanks!” She called back, sighing as she prepared her notes for the meeting.

She stood up and took her laptop with her, making her way to the meeting room, seeing other people on their way as well. She took her seat and waited for it to start, preparing to present her stories. It took a while, but eventually the attention was on her.

“MJ, what have you got?” Asked Robbie expectantly.

“I followed up on the new Oscorp project, and it came out to be a dead end, nothing noteworthy. But I’ve just finished an article on the new research stations, and i can keep updating on them over the next few months” she replied, showing her article from her laptop.

“Good, keep us posted on that. On to you, brock...” he began, as MJ started to zone out, stifling a yawn.

As the meeting ended, MJ felt her stomach grumble, and she left to take her lunch break, heading to a nearby pizza place by herself. She ordered a large pizza and a medium, to save for later, and tried to tale jer time with them and avoid making herself sick.

She left the restaurant, feeling a little nauseous, and slowly walked back to work, and wondered about her illness.

“If it keeps up, i should see a doctor” she said to herself. “Maybe i should check with aunt may, haven’t seen her in a while and she always knows what to do” she thought.
111132111111.title: Continue (RESERVED)

1111321111111.content:
Mary Jane was relived that on Fridays the Bugle closed an hour earlier than usual. She was beyond anxious to see Aunt May. Even though things could be awkward with her and Peter being broken up, she always loved her. And she knew that Aunt May absolutely adored her.

MJ took a bus that stopped in Chinatown near F.E.A.S.T. and walked a few blocks over to it, reaching the homeless shelter a few minutes before 5. Another reason why she was glad that the Bugle closed early was because Aunt May would probably have already left by the time she would have gotten off work normally. She was already cutting it close as it was.

Inside F.E.A.S.T., she was surprised to see how well things were going. The last time she had been inside it was when she and Peter were still together, and it wasn't in the best of shape. Now, things really seemed to be running smoothly.

As she walked through the cafeteria to Aunt May's office, she was approached by a man wearing a suit and tie with his sleeves rolled up.

"Can I help you, miss?" he asked.

"Yeah, I was looking for May Parker," she replied, blushing as her stomach let out a low rumble.

The man nodded. "Ah. You must be Mary Jane Watson. She's told me a lot about you. I'm Martin Li."

He put out his hand, which MJ shook.

"I am. It's nice to meet you, Mr. Li."

"Nice to meet you, too. May's office is upstairs. Can't miss it," he smiled, going back to work.

Mary Jane nodded and walked up the nearest stairwell. Sure enough, Aunt May's office greeted her as soon as she got to the second floor. Inside, May was reorganizing her desk.

MJ stood in the doorway and knocked on the wall. Aunt May looked up and beamed when she saw her.

"Mary Jane!" she rushed over to MJ and hugged her, nearly knocking the wind out of her.

"It's good to see you too, Aunt May..." Mary Jane giggled.

"Oh, it's been too long. How are you?" she asked.

Mary Jane sighed. "I'm good. Daily Bugle's keeping me busy. Actually...I have been pretty sick this week. Just a lot of nausea, and I'm still feeling a little off. Do you have anything that could help me?"

Aunt May's eyes lit up. "I have just the thing."

She went to the mini-fridge in her office and grabbed a bottle. She explained that it was homemade tea that contained all-natural herbs that would make her feel better in no time. To be honest, MJ didn't entirely listen to all of the ingredients that were in the tea, since her hunger was keeping her preoccupied.

"Thanks, Aunt May. I really appreciate it," Mary Jane said, bottle of tea in hand.

"Any time, sweetheart. I'll tell Peter that you're doing well!"

"Oh. Thanks."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Back at her apartment, MJ took a swig of Aunt May's tea. It tasted great, and if it did help cure her nausea she was all for it.

Once again, her stomach rumbled.

"Ugh, why am I so hungry now?" she asked herself.

She grabbed her cellphone and dialed the closest Chinese restaurant. As she waited, she sat on her couch and watched TV, alternating between the news and a few shows. After what seemed like an eternity, it finally arrived. She put the bag on the coffee table in front of the couch, unveiling many boxes of noodles, rice, dumplings, and more.

As quickly as she could, she grabbed the chopsticks that came with the food and chowed down. Nearly an hour passed, and Mary Jane finally finished. She stifled a burp and was shocked at how much she ate, observing the dozen empty boxes that scattered the coffee table.

"Did I really eat that much? I need to hit the gym tomorrow," she muttered.

With another sigh, MJ stood up and stretched. As she did, she looked down.

Her stomach was bloated. It wasn't too noticeable, but it was still there. She guess she couldn't be too surprised, with how much she had eaten over the past few days, but it still concerned her.

She pressed a hand into her puffy tummy, feeling how firm it was.

"Yeah. Definitely need to go to the gym," she said with a yawn.

Feeling exhausted from a busy week, she threw the boxes away and headed to bed. As she lay down, her hand rested on her stomach as it gurgled away.
1111321111111.title: Go see Aunt May after work (RESERVED)

11113211111111.content:
MJ woke up, and waited for a moment, for her stomach to groan and force her to the bathroom to empty its contents. But the moment didn’t come. She sat up and got out of bed, silently celebrating her now gone sickness, and making a mental note to thank Aunt may for her remedy.

She got up to go to the bathroom, and glanced at herself in the mirror. Her belly was bloated. Not massively but big enough that it was noteworthy. She prodded it and felt its firmness, remembering her promise to go to the gym and burn it off. If anything it seemed to be bigger than she recalled, though not by much.

She got dressed to go to the gym, putting on some loose sweatpants and a sports bra that felt far too tight on her boobs, and a gym top. She sighed as the top wouldn’t pull all the way over her bloat, leaving a thin sliver o belly exposed. She grabbed a smoothie from the fridge and headed to the gym.

When she got to the gym she decided to start off with some ab workouts, to see if they would help with her pot belly. She tried crunches first, and felt they were helping, going on for a few more sets. After, she moved onto sit ups, finding them a lot harder given her belly was stopping her from properly bending over for them. She stopped, taking a break, and downing what was left of her drink.

She headed to the treadmill, picking up a bottle of water on her way. She started off at a slow jog, and then eased the speed up till she was at a good running pace. She kept it up for a few minutes, and then started to run out of breath, to her annoyance. She could usually go for a lot longer. She turned down the speed to a fast walk, catching her breath as she walked.

Next to her a woman started up, going at a similar pace to her. MJ looked at her and saw that the woman was heavily pregnant, her belly looking ready to pop at any moment. The woman looked at MJ, panning up from her abdomen to her face and smiled, confusing her. She smiled back politely, but confused. People didn’t usually do that, and not least the pregnant members of the gym.

She left the gym, feeling starved and eager to have her breakfast, her stomach grumbling and empty. She got back into her apartment and started to make her breakfast, making toaster waffles and bacon.

“Kinda defeats the point of going to the gym” she noted, the smells in her kitchen driving her to keep cooking.

As she sat on her sofa with her breakfast in hand, and a mouthful of waffles, she opened her laptop to try something. She gave one last search, as thorough as she could be, into the syrum, desperate to find out about it. But like every other search, she found nothing.
11113211111111.title: Week 2 begins (RESERVED)

111132111111111.content:
With a sigh, Mary Jane closed her laptop and tapped her fingernails on its top, wondering what to do next. What could that serum possibly have been? How could it possibly change the world? Was it truly behind her recent illness, and could it be more serious for her than just throwing up?

There were too many questions, and too few answers. Usually, when something peaked MJ's curiosity, some investigation would eventually lead a solution. But with whatever was in that vial, she seemed to hit dead end after dead end. It frustrated her to no end.

On the bright side, at least she wasn't vomiting anymore. Speaking of, that reminded her to check in with Aunt May to thank her. She dialed her number, and soon enough Aunt May picked up.

"Hello?" she asked.

"Hey, Aunt May! It's me, Mary Jane."

"Oh, hi! How are you?"

MJ stood up and started to walk around the apartment. "I'm good, I'm good. I was actually calling you because of that. That tea you gave me really worked wonders. Absolutely zero nausea today."

"Well, that's great! I'm so happy to hear that, dear."

MJ laughed. "I don't want to take anymore of your time, Aunt May. Thanks again."

"Any time! I'll talk to you soon!"

MJ put her phone down. "She is such a saint..."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A few hours and a shower later, Mary Jane was getting hungry again. She put on some clothes that would be presentable for leaving her apartment, pleased that it covered up her recent bloating, and headed to the one place she knew would never disappoint: Mick's Diner.

The walk from her apartment wasn't too far, and she figured getting some more exercise wouldn't hurt.

On the way, she heard sirens and the revving of engines approaching. A car sped by, with men hanging out of the windows, firing at the cop cars behind them.

Suddenly, MJ heard a noise. A noise she was all too familiar to hearing.

A web stuck to the back of the car, and Spider-Man launched himself to the trunk.

"Hang on, boys! You forgot your speeding ticket! Come on, you can't be hiding anything too illegal in there, right?"

He'd gone through this early a hundred times now, and made quick work of the criminals, stopping their car before it did any real damage. Before the police could catch up, Spider-Man swung away.

Mary Jane shook her head as she approached the diner.

"Always the showman..." she muttered.

Inside Mick's, MJ grabbed a booth near the window and looked out at the city. The waitress handed her a menu, and she raised an eyebrow when she read it.

"When did Mick's become an Italian restaurant?" she asked herself.

The waitress returned a minute later to take her order.

"What can I get for you?" the waitress asked.

MJ's stomach rumbled, causing her face to go as red as her hair.

"Um...I'll have an order of the fries. Actually, make that two. Also, can I get a small pepperoni pizza and the chicken parm?" she asked.

The waitress nodded and smiled. "Absolutely! I'll get that right in for you!"

She took Mary Jane's menu, leaving her to herself. Shortly after, her food arrived, and she dug in quickly.

Not even fifteen minutes later, she was finished, leaving no plate unempty. Satisfied with the meal, May Jane paid for the food and headed back to her apartment.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

MJ opened the door of her apartment, her free hand cradling her bloated stomach.

"Ugh...you can't stay in shape if you keep eating like this, girl..." she said to herself.

The next few hours were spent watching TV, and she found herself exhausted, even after not doing that much all day. With a yawn, Mary Jane stood up from the couch and headed to bed.
111132111111111.title: Continue (RESERVED)

1111321111111111.content:
MJ woke up to the blaring sound of her alarm. She opened her eyes and reached over to shut it off. After a weekend of not doing a lot, the alarm was a rude awakening for her. She got out of bed and headed to her kitchen to make a cup of coffee, recalling what she had done yesterday.

She had started with a morning run, and then a trip to rhe gym to trim her belly away. But again, her hunger got the best of her and she indulged in a full breakfast, reversing any work done at the gym. She went home and began writing up some notes on that weeks crimes stopped by good old spider-man.

She finished making her coffee and headed to her room, sipping it. She noted that it tasted more bitter than usual, despite her adding more sugar than normal. She walked into the bathroom to shower, and started to get changed, and saw her reflection. Her belly was getting bigger, now sticking out even more than it had that weeked. She sighed.

“Gotta stop eating so much” she said, patting it gently.

After her shower she started to get dressed for work, grabbing some jeans and a button up shirt. As she pulled her jeans up she got to her waist, starting to button them up. She struggled with the last button, pulling as hard as she could, but it kept digging into her belly. She sighed, and then remembered a trick a friend taught her. She grabbed a a hairband and looped it around the button and through the hole. She smiled as it fit in, keeping her belly from busting her jeans.

She finished dressing, her shirt just hiding her belly and her jacket helping with hiding it as well. With that she set off for work, grabbing breakfast on the way.

— — — -

At work, MJ started writing up the notes she had made on the endeavours of spider-man, noting a few recent sitings from social media, and the recent crime he stopped. She opened up a video of it happening and watched it a few times to get a good gist of things.

“Hey MJ” she heard Betty call “how was your weekend?”

“Good, didn’t do much though” she replied, turning around from her work

“Ah nice, me too” she smiles “wanna go grab lunch?”

MJ looked at the time. “Yeah sure, anywhere in particular?”

“Theres a new mexican place down the road i wanted to try” she smiled, handing MJ her jacket.

They sat in the restaurant and talked about the last week, and how things had been going. They talked about MJs new article on spiderman and how it was going,

“With the stuff I’ve said about him, Jameson would have had me fired” she laughs.

“Haha, i always thought he was way too hard on him” Betty replies

“Yeah. He does a lot of good, more than he does bad” she replied, her private knowledge of him popping up in her mind.

They ate and talked for a while, before heading back to work, where MJ finished her article.
1111321111111111.title: Week 2 continues

11113211111111111.content:
On the way back to her apartment, Mary Jane realized that she was running low on food. Eating as much as she had the past few days would do that. She got off a stop earlier than she normally would, and headed to the nearest grocery store, a small independent place that she liked to frequent.

Inside the grocery store, MJ picked up what she usually got when she went shopping every two weeks. As it turned out, she had to make her visit a little earlier in the week than she typically did.

To make matters worse, her rumbling stomach made sure that her shopping cart was much more full than usual. She sighed as she picked up some noodles. She piled ice cream, which she usually tried to stay away from, chips, and frozen pizza into the cart. The weirdest thing she got was a jar of pickles. Normally, she detested them. But now, she actually really wanted to get some.

Finally filling up the cart, Mary Jane paid for all of the groceries and left for her apartment, multiple bags filled groceries in her hands.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Inside the apartment, MJ set the bags in the kitchen and began to unpack them. To make things more difficult, her stomach was constantly making noises, almost as if it was demanding that she ate the food she spent nearly an hour buying.

Mary Jane rubbed it slowly to try and quell the rumbling, annoyed at how tight and round it was.

"I need to go to the gym again. Maybe tomorrow."

Once she got everything put away, she began to make dinner. Pasta and bread were on the menu tonight. MJ wanted something relatively healthy that still tasted good, and even with her unpredictable cooking she could still find some enjoyment out of it.

It felt like it lasted forever, but Mary Jane finally finished cooking, and couldn't wait to start eating. She doused the pasta with cheese and slathered the bread in butter, again a break from her norms.

MJ could only shake her head, but even that stopped when she actually took her first bite. She practically moaned when she tasted the food. She tried to savor it, but before she knew it she had finished.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

In a warehouse by the docks, a master plan was beginning to unfold. A van pulled into the parking lot, which was empty except for one other car.

"You sure this is safe?" a man with a ski mask on asked.

"Of course. The boss knows what he's doing," the other man replied, who also had his face covered.

"I'm still wondering when you're going to let me meet this guy you're working for."

"You might not get to. He's a very smoke and mirrors kinda guy. Doesn't do a lot of face to face."

"Fine. You ready?"

"Ready."
11113211111111111.title: Next day (RESERVED)

111132111111111111.content:
She woke up before her alarm started blaring, laying in her bed, watching it tick down. She resolved to get out of bed, and threw her cocers off, immediately throwing them back on after seeing beneath. Slowly she peeled them off, revealing her swollen belly, bigger than amy other day so far. Her shirt had ridden up, baring the tight skin, and she could barely see her toes behind it.

“What the hell” she said, tentatively placing her hands on it, feeling the tight skin. “I have got to stop eating, it must be giving me a bad reaction or something”

She heaved herself out of bed, struggling with the new weight in her belly, swinging her legs off the bed, and standing uneasily with her hands on her back. She made her way to the kitchen, grabbing a pot of yogurt, trying to have a small breakfast before heading to the gym. She quickly grabbed another, soon after finishing the first faster than she expected.

Back in her room she laid out her gym clothes on her bed and stared at them, wondering how in earth she would fit in them. She started with her shirt, stretching it over herself and starting to pull it down, covering her breasts and starting on her belly, but reaching only above her belly button. She huffed in frustration.

“It’ll have to do i guess” she says, grabbing her pants.

She had a far harder time pulling them on, struggling to bend over and pull them up. She managed to, but when she reached her hips she found it once again a struggle to hoist them up over her hips, feeling tighter than before, and pulling them up left them far too tight.

“Damn it!” She said, huffing slightly out of breath. “Screw the gym”

She pulled off her shirt in frustration, and shimmied her way out of her pants, grabbing some clothes for work instead. She put on a large loose t-shirt to try and cover her belly, before grabbing a pair of jeans, using the hairband trick to make them stay comfortable around her belly. She pulled on her jacket, put on a scarf, and slipped into her shoes. She stopped in the kitchen and grabbed a croissant and some snack bars for breakfast before heading off to work.

— — — -

At work she resigned herself to her desk, worried that someone would see it and get suspicious about her condition. Luckily for her it hid her belly. Unfortunately she kept having to go to the bathroom, which became a risky mission to hide her belly on the way. Her morning was spent between her desk and the bathroom, which left her starving for lunch.

She left for lunch to a deli nearby, grabbing a sandwich and plenty of snacks, for lunch and to keep her going through the day. She had a packet of chips by her side as she was typing up some notes on a new spidey article, breaking every now and again with a handfull of chips.

“Hey MJ” she heard, as Betty walked towards her.

“Hey Betty!” She panicked, finishing her mouthful of chips and turning to her, at angle to hide her belly.

“Enjoying your snack” she laughed back, MJ giggling in reply. “Robbie has a new story for you, sounds interesting”

“Oh tell me about it” she smiled, pausing as she felt a flutter in her stomach, passing it off as gas.

Betty handed her a small folder. “A small scale lab had a whole bunch of tech stolen from a warehouse by the docks” she said, showing her the file. “Sounds right up your alley”

She took the file and read through it, something about the robbery pricking her memory, reminding her of something. “I’ll get right on it, I’ll head down there now”

“Have fun” Betty grinned, knowing MJs reputation for ‘crazy stunts’ as robbie had put it.

— — — -

The warehouse wasn’t too far away, a few stops on the subway, and MJ arrived, ready to investigate. She had her jacket done up slightly to hide her belly, but it wasn’t doing the best job if she was honest. She walked up to the police line and flashed her badge, gaining her entry into the scene. She looked around and snapped a few photos, before moving onto conducting interviews with the workers.

“Hi, Mary Jane Watson for the daily bugle” she said, approaching a man who worked at the warehouse. “Mind if I ask you some questions?”

“Uhh sure” he replied, with a noticeable Brooklyn accent. His eyes darted to her belly quickly.

“Can you tell me what was stolen?” She asked, trying to keep focused.

“Uh nothing major, just a lot of our basic components and stuff” he replied, still distracted by her belly.

“Hey, can we stay focused please” she snapped, trying not to sound too demanding.

The man answered a few more questions, and then she thanked him and moved onto other workers, gaining a picture of the scene.
111132111111111111.title: Another day begins (RESERVED)

1111321111111111111.content:
Getting everything in order, Mary Jane took note of everything she could. She thanked the people that she interviewed, and headed back to work.

Back at the Bugle, MJ piled over the statements she got. It honestly didn't really make sense. If what one of the interviewees said was true, then only some minor components were stolen. Usually in theft cases like this, they'd usually go after items that would be more valuable. The components stolen in this case would barely get you $50.

"Unless the thieves aren't trying to sell the parts at all. Maybe they're using them for something else..." she mused, a hand on her round, swollen stomach.

Mary Jane scoffed and removed her hand, shaking her head. She was doing that a lot lately.

Her mind ran through the possibility of what the thieves could be up to. Were they actually using the parts for their own needs? Was she wrong about that? Was it possible that this wouldn't be the last time that they struck?

With that last question, MJ figured that her only option was to wait and see. For now, she chalked it up to a one-off that wouldn't ever resurface.

Mary Jane's thoughts were interrupted by Betty.

"Hey, MJ," she said.

MJ looked up, subconsciously scooting her seat forward to hide her belly. "Hey, Betty! What's up?"

"So, me and a few friends are going out clubbing tonight. I was just wondering if you were interested in coming along!" she said.

"You go clubbing in the middle of the week?" Mary Jane asked.

Betty nodded. "Yeah, we have a great time."

"Oh...I really appreciate the offer, but I've just been exhausted the past few nights. I'm already a little worn-down right now. I think I'm going to pass, sorry."

"That's okay! I'm sure Robbie would prefer that his best reporter didn't come in with a hangover tomorrow anyways," Betty laughed.

"Right. Thanks, though!" MJ said as Betty returned to her desk.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A few hours later, Mary Jane packed her things and started to head out.

"Good night, Betty," she said as she passed the secretary's desk.

"Night, MJ--" Betty stopped herself when she saw Mary Jane's stomach.

Her jacket had no chance of hiding it when she was walking.

She was huge! She almost looked...pregnant, Betty thought.

"Must be seeing things," Betty said, shaking her head.

On the subway, it was surprisingly packed. Normally, Mary Jane would have no trouble finding an empty seat, but no such luck today. She stood, one hand on a railing with another on her back, subconsciously accentuating her belly even more.

Moments later, a man stood up and motioned towards her.

"Excuse me, ma'am? Feel free to take my seat," he said.

"Oh, really? Thank you..." she replied, happily taking his seat.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

MJ sighed when she entered her apartment. She was right when she was talking to Betty earlier. She was exhausted. After putting her jacket on the coat rack, she leaned against the door and tried to catch her breath.

Mary Jane looked down at her stomach. It was getting big. She held it gently in her hands, feeling the pale tight skin. Another squirm, like the one she felt earlier, moved underneath her fingertips.

"Well, I can't get rid of it if I don't do anything about it!" she said.

MJ made her way to her bedroom as quickly as she could to change back into her gym clothes. With the state she was in, she didn't want to be seen in a gym, but she could still do some workouts at her apartment.

She stood in the mirror once she got dressed and turned to the side. Her butt was huge. When did that happen? And of course, her breasts were still swollen. If her belly hadn't grown, maybe this "illness" was worth it.

But the belly really put a damper on things.

In the living room, Mary Jane sat on the floor. Her first option was to do some crunches. She couldn't even do that. Her stomach was so big that it made it nearly impossible, and extremely uncomfortable even when she could sit up all the way.

Shaking her head, MJ slowly stood up and headed to the kitchen, upset that she couldn't even work out properly anymore. Vowing to eat healthy, she grabbed some salad from the refrigerator and ate, but not before putting plenty of dressing and croutons on it.

Hours later, Mary Jane headed to bed, her stomach rumbling with hunger.
1111321111111111111.title: Continue (RESERVED)

11113211111111111111.content:
MJ woke up to the sound of grumbling and a slightly pained feeling emanating from her stomach. She opened her eyes, surprised to see that it was still dark out, with very little light illuminating her bedroom. She turned her bedside lamp on, and slowly got out of bed. She stood up and held her hands on her back, supporting it. A glance at the clock told her that it was about 1:45 in the morning. MJ started walking to the kitchen, noting that her belly felt heavier and, if anything looked bigger.

She got to the kitchen and immediately went for the fridge. MJ scoured it for snacks, absent-mindedly rubbing the bare section of her belly. She grabbed some sushi, some pickles, and a bunch of toasted meals as well as some stuff for the microwave, rushing around the kitchen to prepare it all. The smells coming from around her drove her hunger further and she became far more excited to eat.

As soon as the microwave pinged and the toaster popped up MJ grabbed her food and began wolfing it down, wanting so badly to savour it, the taste feeling amazing on her tongue, but she just ate quickly, filling her empty stomach. She grabbed a pickle and wolfed it down with some sushi, the combination somehow appealing to her, so much so that she tried it again, and again. As she ate, drips and crumbs dropped onto her belly, running down the bare skin.

As she ate she felt squirming from her belly, strange movements across her bump. It came and went, popping up between mouthfuls or stopping for a bit and the suddenly coming back later. In her current state, MJ put it down to her stomach reacting to finally being full, and digesting loudly.

Eventually her midnight feast came to an end, but by that point MJ felt too full to eat anything more. She sat for a bit and rubbed her full stomach, massaging the tight orb before heaving herself up and heading back to bed, this time with a full stomach.

————

MJ woke up again, this time to her alarms loud declaration to wake up. She groaned and slapped it off, opening her eyes to bright light shining through her window, and threw off her covers. Standing up slowly, she walked to the bathroom and saw in the mirror that her belly had gotten bigger, protruding off her frame like a beachball. Her tank top was now more of a crop top, or more of a bra, only covering her now generous bust.

“What the hell” she mumbled, pressing her hands into the tight skin.

Mary Jane sighed and walked to her wardrobe, searching for anything that might fit her. Her search turned up dry, resolving for a pair of jeans and a releatively big button up shirt, hoping that it could cover her belly.

Starting with the jeans, she struggled to bend over and pull them up, and even clearing that it was a further struggle to fit them around her hips and booty. When they finally were one, MJ neglected the hairband trick, fearing it would make the jeans even tighter. Then came the shirt, which started off well over her breasts, but strained dangerously over her belly, digging in a little, and each button pulling apart, creating little windows to her swollen belly through them.

“It’s gonna have to do” she sighed, frustrated

Mary Jane threw on her jacket and a large scarf, trying to cover as much belly as possible. With one last glance in the mirror, she headed off to work, grabbing a hearty breakfast on the way.

———-

At work everyone was already in the meeting, talking about their weekend plans and other things. Except Robbie, who was sat at the head of the table wondering where his top reporter was.

“Betty where is Mary Jane? Shes late” he asked.

“No idea. She’s been kinda off the past few we-“ she started, cut off by the sudden entrance of Mary Jane.

“Sorry im late” she said, flustered and looking a little red in the face.

She looked a right state, blushing profusely, and her shirt tight onher belly. The belly that no one had noticed for a week. Her shirt was practically showing it off, letting them all see her tight pale skin beneath it. Some noticed her jeans weren’t done up, but dared not to speak up. She sat down on a chair and looked ready to start.

“Are you okay miss watson?” Robbie asked, concerned about her.

“Yeah im fine, just a bad reaction” MJ replied, rubbing her belly underneath the table as she felt the squirming again.

“Are you sure?” He asked.

“Im fine, i swear” she snapped. “Can we just get on with this please”

“Yes, we can” Robbie replied, a little shocked. “Miss Watson, that lab story you’ve been doing? There was another break in, different lab but similar conditions. Look into it”

She nodded at him and noted it down. He moved onto the next person, and MJ began to zone out, distracted by the feeling in her belly. Like a squirming or something. It persisted for the rest of the hour long meeting, putting her off when she should have been paying attention. When the meeting ended, she was the first one out, rushing to the bathroom as fast as she could. When she was finishes, MJ grabbed her bag and set off to the new scene of a break in.

———

She walked towards the lab, flashing her badge to the officer outside, lifting the police line and entering. It was a similar scene to the previous break in, equipment moved about and thrown around, storage lockers opened and rifled through thoroughly

MJ walked around and began her interviews, starting with a woman in a lab coat, who smiled at her as she approached.

“Hi, Mary Jane Watson for the daily bugle, mind if i ask a few questions?” She said.

“Of course,” replied the woman, smiling. “What would you like to know?”

“What sort of stuff was-“she felt a grumble and blushed. “-stolen”

“Low value materials, wiring and the like. There were a few machines that were ripped apart for some materials as well” she replied.

“Okay, and do you-“ another grumble, followed by a squirm “-think anything dangerous can be made from the stolen items?” She blushed harder.

“In the most capable hands yes, but it doesn’t appear that the theives are the most capable” she laughs.

MJ went to start another question, but another strong squirm put her off and she blushed in embarrassment. “I am so sorry about this” she said, her belly grumbling. “Its just so distracting”

“Its okay, I completely understand” replied the woman, smiling knowingly.

MJ smiled back and carried on the interview, with a few distractions from her belly dotted throughout. She moved on and conducted interviews with several other workers, all telling her similar stories. As she finished her last interview, Mary Jane noticed a slightly ajar door, and her curiosity took over. She snuck in and found the security room, screens all over the walls.

“Aha, maybe this will reveal whos behind this” she grinned, finding the security footage from the previous night.

She brought it up and watched, switching from screen to screen, following the thieves around the lab. She sped up the footage, partly because she didn’t want to be caught where she shouldn’t be, but partly to suss out where the thieves went after they left. Switching to the outside camera, the robbers could be seen running to a van with their loot.

“Bingo” MJ grinned, saving the clip to her hard drive to scour over later.

— — —

Back at work, Mary Jane was sat at her desk, the security footage on loop on her laptop, noting down every detail she could find. The van had no license plate, but there was a scratched up logo on the side, that looked like a pack of cards. Her stomach gave a sudden loud grumble.

Sighing, she got up, and made her way to the vending machine, pulling several notes out of her wallet. MJ grabbed a few chip packets and some sweets, returning to her desk, already snacking on her mini feast.
11113211111111111111.title: The next day...or not? (RESERVED)

111132111111111111111.content:
Mary Jane sat down heavily, the chair creaking as she did so. She rubbed her stomach absentmindedly as she piled all of her evidence together. All the while, she munched on some cookies. The chewing was so loud that she could barely hear Betty approach her.

"H-hey MJ..." she muttered, a little intimidated at the sight in front of her.

"Oh, hi. What's up, Betty?" MJ asked, her hand resting on top of her increasingly rounding dome of a stomach.

"I...I was just wondering...if everything was okay? With you?" Betty wondered.

Mary Jane's stomach rumbled loudly.

"It's just...you've been a bit...off...all week? I just want to make sure that you're doing alright," she said.

"Oh? You mean this?" Mary Jane asked, patting her stomach, which gurgled in response.

"Betty, I'm fine. Thank you for checking on me, but I promise I'm fine. I've just been eating terribly for a few weeks now, and I think it's catching up to me."

Betty nodded, a look of dismay on her face as she stared at MJ's protruding belly.

It gurgled and groaned, and Betty swore she even saw it move. Mary Jane winced, but smiled to try and alleviate the secretary's fear.

Before Betty could say anything else, the button on MJ's jeans popped off. It was a miracle that it closed in the first place, so it wasn't really surprising that it happened.

Mary Jane gasped and looked down, a hand fondling for the now-removed button. She looked up at Betty, her face red as a beet. That was also happening a lot lately.

Betty also blushed, and finally looked away. "Oh! I'm so sorry!"

Betty covered her face and hurried away. MJ, finally recovering from that embarrassing moment, grabbed a rubber band from her desk and used it to button her jeans.

"What is happening to me?" Mary Jane asked, a particularly strong squirm in her belly making her rest her hands on the bump once more.

The rest of the day was uneventful, and Mary Jane stuck to her desk until it was time to leave. Quietly and as quickly as she could, she headed back to her apartment, not bothering to say goodbye to anyone.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Finally back home, MJ buried her hands in her face. Something was seriously wrong with her, and she had no idea what. She looked down at her massive stomach and watched as it heaved in and out.

It was huge, and felt like it was getting bigger every time she looked. For all she knew, maybe she actually was.

What could be the cause of this? She couldn't be pregnant, she knew that. A bad reaction surely wouldn't cause her to balloon as big as this. Could it be a tumor?

Mary Jane placed her hands on her round bump as it quivered and groaned. Whatever was wrong with her, she needed to find out.

Unbuttoning her shirt to breathe easier, her massive belly hung out in the open as she grabbed her phone. She contacted her doctor, requesting a checkup.

MJ didn't really go deep into detail about what the issue was, because to be honest even she wasn't entirely sure. Able to slip in an appointment for tomorrow morning, she sighed in relief. Even if something was seriously wrong with her, at least she'd find out in due time.

She changed into some more comfortable clothes, consisting of running shorts and a t-shirt. The shorts hugged her larger bottom, while her t-shirt revealed a sliver of her belly. She rubbed her hands over it, feeling that her belly button was nearly flat.

After a fast but large dinner, Mary Jane trudged to bed, ignoring the stirring in her stomach as she drifted off to sleep.
111132111111111111111.title: The calm before the storm...

choices: Clear her head and go our for a walk (RESERVED)
1111321111111111111111.content:
Sudden stirrings in her stomach woke MJ up. She groaned as the stirrings became more intense, forcing her to wake up properly, opening her eyes and glaring at her belly. She threw back her covers to access her grumbling stomach, but was caught off guard by the it. It had grown overnight, bulging off her skinny frame like a beachball, her skin pulled tight and sore over whatever was inside her. She saw something ripple on her belly, subtle and small but there, squirming and stirring in her belly.

“What the hell” she groaned as she heaved herself put of bed, scared of what was happening to her. Even can't trying to push herself up got her out of breath, and she leant against her dresser to steady herself, unaccustomed to her new centre of balance.

She waddled her way to the bathroom, the light feeling bright as it flickered on. She watched herself in the mirror as she stripped off, staring anxiously at her body, feeling self-conscious despite being the only person there. Turning around to the shower, her belly brushed against the countertop, knocking off some toothpaste and some makeup. She sighed, knowing how much of a struggle it would be to pick up, and ignored it for the time being. MJ stepped into the shower and felt some of the tension in her body soften as the hot water ran down her rounded belly. Hesitantly, her hands washed soapy water over her stomach, feeling and seeing flutters ripple across her belly, and she felt tears drip from her eyes, feeling scared and alone. She wept quietly, letting the shower wash the tears away before wiping her face and turning off the water, struggling to dry her frame with even two towels. She turned and bumped against a cabinet, shaking it and threatening to knock it over, steadying it with her hands.

Stepping out of the bathroom, her hair still drying in a wrapped up towel, MJ laid out the most loose-fitting clothes she could find from her closet. Sighing in resignation at the idea that anything would fit, she grabbed her pants, a pair of loose black slacks, that she hoped would cover her. She sat down on the bed and stepped into them, now faced with the daunting task of pulling them up. Struggling, MJ bent over and grabbed the waistband, hoisting them up her legs, fitting fairly comfortably compared to other items. She stood up and began to button them up, barely even making it up the first button, resigning to the hairband trick again. However, it proved less successful, still leaving a small window to her panties.

Next came her shirt, a flowing white tee, that she tended to use as pyjamas, or when she lazed about her apartment. An attempt had been made to get a bra on, but her breasts had grown significantly from her normal cup size, none of them even reaching around. She pulled her top over her head and over her growing bust, managing to yank it over them, but some cleavage being left on display. Her belly was a different matter, the shirt making it just over halfway before it would no longer pull down, leaving the bottom few inches open to the elements, the shirt just hanging off her bump. She grabbed a dark blue flannel shirt and put it on, hoping it would distract from the bottom portion of her belly hanging out of her shirt.

Looking over herself in the mirror, Mary-jane felt she looked presentable, although she knew that she looked funny, her belly sticking out painfully obviously. she kept trying to pull down the hem of her first to try and cover some more of her belly. She slipped into a pair of slip-on shoes, glad she had bought them all those weeks ago, saving her from the effort of having to try and tie her laces.

----------

The journey to the doctors had been quick, MJ not wanting to spend more time being seen how she was than was absolutely needed. She waddled to the desk and signed in with the sweet older lady who usually manned the reception, who congratulated MJ to her confusion. Tired, and her belly weighing down on her, MJ grabbed a seat in the empty waiting room. She struggled to sit comfortably in the chair, however, her hips digging into the armrests, and her heavy belly filling her lap entirely.

”Miss Watson?” called one of the nurses, poking her head out from the office.

”Here” MJ stated as she started to stand up. Her hips had other ideas, as they were now fairly jammed into the seat, the armrests digging uncomfortably into her thighs. She grunted as she tried to stand up, and blushed with intense embarrassment when the nurse walked over to help her out of the seat, levering her hand between her hips and the chair to let her move. Thanking her profusely for her help, MJ walked into her doctors office, nervous.

”Good morning miss wat-” started her doctor, who was cut short upon turning around.

”yeah I know” she replied quietly as she sat on a, thankfully spacious, chair.

”How did this happen? I saw you two months ago and there were no signs of any sort of growth” he stated in confusion.

”it started about a week ago, and it was preceded by really bad flu” she said, unconsciously cradling her belly. ”intense vomiting, that sort of thing”

Her doctor pulled put a pair of scales and set them down on the floor. ”if you would please step on the scales” he said politely, still confused.

She heaved herself up, eased by some assistance from the doctor and stepped forward onto the scales. She looked down to try and peek at the result, but her mountain of a belly blocked her view, covering anything going on below her. ”how much is it?” she asked nervously.

”about 170lbs, up from your previous weight of 120” he said, grabbing a tape measure. ”could you pull up your shirt please?”

MJ obliged and slowly pulled up her shirt, tucking it under her breasts and baring her belly. He started by gently squeezing it between his gloved hands, on the sides, then from top to bottom, with a few prods and pokes between, and then lightly shifting it from side to side. He then began to measure it, first from top to bottom, then scribbling down the result. He began to go around her belly, starting at her flattened belly button, but a sudden squirm made him stop in his tracks.

”could you lie down on there please” he said, gesturing to the bed in the centre of the room, before leaving to grab something.

MJ lay down on it, her nerves getting to her as she began to fear the worst, his sudden change in method spooking her. She held her belly as she waited for the doctor. He walked back in with a large machine trailing behind him. He flipped a few switches and it buzzed to life, and as it warmed up he began to further poke and prod her belly, testing it for more flickers or squirms.

”this will feel quite cold” he said, before squirting some gel onto her belly and picking up a wand from the machine. That told MJ that it was an ultrasound. And as the wand made contact with her belly she realised what might be happening to her.

”Well miss Watson it seems-” her doctor started, ”-that you are expecting”

”h-how? And how am I so big?” she stammered, confused and even more scared at the prospect of being pregnant.

”Give me a second” her doctor said, trailing off as he concentrated on a screen, moving the wand all over her bulging belly. ”one” he said, quietly as if to try and hide it from her. ”two, three, four” he said, the numbers going up, making MJs heart start to race. ”five, six” two more, and she tightened her grip on the bed, scared. ”It appears that you are carrying seve-no, eight foetuses” he finished, making sure he had been right.

The revelation hit MJ hard, as her mind raced through every possibility, from how it happened, to how she was carrying eight babies, or why everything had happened so fast. She sat up and wiped off her belly as her doctor gave her some information about pregnancy, handing her some pamphlets and the number for an OB/GYN, but most of what he said fell on deaf ears.

MJ made her way home in silent resignation. She was in shock, and her belly felt somehow more alien than before, as if she was afraid to touch or rub it. She unlocked the door to her apartment and stepped inside, collapsing on her sofa. She looked down at her belly, deep in thought, and tentatively pulled up her shirt, starting to caress the bare surface. She wondered what she would do, and how she would explain it to her boss, all while caressing her taut pulled and pale skin, as she felt tiny flickers beneath her fingertips.
1111321111111111111111.title: The truth is revealed (RESERVED)

11113211111111111111111.content:
Mary Jane's head spun as her hands rested on her pregnant belly.

Pregnant. She was pregnant.

With eight babies.

How was this possible?

Her mind was so cluttered at the moment, full with thoughts on the pregnancy, the job, and this recent series of break-ins, that she couldn't focus on just one thing. At least she didn't have to go to the Bugle today.

She looked on helplessly as her belly shifted and bulged, the lives within her moving and growing. Mary Jane could only shake her head and look away.

MJ needed to take her mind off of things, or at least clear her mind somewhat. That's when the thought crossed her mind. There was a park nearby. It was almost always quiet. That'd be a perfect place to go to relax.

The only problem would be getting there.

Slowly, Mary Jane rose to her feet, her legs wobbling under the weight of her belly. Finally getting upright and finding her balance, she waddled to the front door, but was stopped by a loud growl from her stomach.

She'd been so preoccupied with the doctor's appointment that she completely forgot to eat. On the way to the park, she stopped by a local bakery and grabbed a dozen donuts.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

At the park, MJ trudged towards a bench and sat down, her belly completely filling her lap. She placed the box of donuts beside her and ate quickly, her hunger overcoming her. Within minutes, the box was empty, and she stood up to throw it away.

For the next thirty minutes, Mary Jane waddled around the park, taking in the sights and sounds of the peaceful area.

As she expected, it was a nice break away from everything, except for the occasional passerby who couldn't keep their eyes off her massive belly as they walked by.

After she walked around the park, MJ was exhausted. Her belly heaved in and out as she tried to catch her breath. That signaled that it was time for her to head home. It'd been quite the day so far, so some rest was much-needed.

Waddling a few blocks back to her apartment, she suddenly stopped when she saw a van. It had a familiar design on the side.

A pack of cards.

Could this be the same van that was at the recent break-ins? Mary Jane had to find out.

As quickly as she could now, she followed it, thankful that the crosswalk lights were on her side for once. She kept a careful distance, not wanting to look suspicious.

Eventually, it looked like the van was slowing down, as if it were close to its destination, and luckily it wasn't too far from her apartment.

Then MJ heard it. A thwip of a web. She looked up and saw Spider-Man swinging above, perched on top of a building, looking down at the van.

Mary Jane quickly hid from his view. He couldn't see her like this. No way.

Was he tracking the case as well?

"Fine. I'll let you handle it this time, Pete..." she mumbled as she turned around and waddled back to her apartment.

The rest of the day was uneventful, as she spent the hours eating and prodding her belly, still trying to wrap her head around this sudden massive pregnancy.
11113211111111111111111.title: Clear her head and go out for a walk (RESERVED)

111132111111111111111111.content:
MJ was sat up in her bed, watching her belly. She had been, rather rudely when she thought about it, woken by some fairly intense squirms and kicks, and had been watching the taut surface for a good twenty minutes. Occasionally she would poke it when the movement stopped, only for a flurry of kicks to follow.

”this is so strange” she mused as she watched a new wave of kicks ripple across her belly.

Eventually, she sighed, realising that she needed to get up eventually. She knew it was going to be a struggle, given how much her belly kept growing every day. Since the previous day its growth wasn't significant, but it was definitely getting bigger, taking up a sizeable portion of her lap when she sat down.

She pivoted herself to the edge of her bed, the action taking the wind out of her, rubbing her belly as she quickly caught her breath. She swung her legs out, knowing she wouldn't be on her feet by the first try, but hoping she could get some momentum to help her up. A few more swings and she heaved herself up onto her feet, steadying herself against her bedside table, her balance being shifted further each day. Yawning she stretched for a moment and set off to her kitchen.

She set up her laptop on the worktop and set about getting some work done while she made herself breakfast. Cautiously she pushed it far from the edge, conscious that her belly had a dangerous tendency to bump into anything standing in its path. She grabbed a pack of waffles from her cupboard, packing all of them into her microwave, her brood driving her to hunger. While MJ waited for the telltale ping to sign that they were done, she began to do a quick search for information relating to the van, trying to find the company logo. The sudden ping followed by beeping distracted her, however, and she turned her attention to perfecting her waffle masterpiece, topping it with whipped cream and assorted fruits from her fridge. Satisfied with her work, she carried it to the sitting room and set it down on the coffee table, returning to fetch her laptop.

She sat down on the sofa, glad to be off her feet. She leaned forward, trying to grab her breakfast, her belly proving as a barrier to her.

”oh come one” she moaned as she sat up from her comfortable position to grab the plate, resting it on her shelf of a belly. ”well there's a good use of you I guess”

While she feasted on her indulgent breakfast, she continued with her work, discovering a little more about the logo, mostly only that the company had been a stage company, until a few years ago they were bought out by an unknown buyer. That alone was enough to peak her curiosity. However after a morning spent digging for more clues, she began to draw up less and less. She opened her phone and ordered herself some lunch from a local burger joint, her stomach growling for more food. She ordered hastily, stacking up her order with several large meals, her hunger overpowering any sense to order slightly more conservatively

Her food soon arrived and she heaved herself off her chair, rubbing the sliver of underbelly bared by her too-small shirt absentmindedly. she opened the door to see the delivery man, who looked at her briefly, in slight shock, before handing her the bag and leaving. She shut her door, blushing, not only because of her appearance, but also due to the speed she grabbed the bag from his hands. Her stomach grumbled as she sat back down on the sofa and opened the bag, the smells driving her wild with hunger. she unpacked her meal and began to chow down, moaning in satisfaction at the food.

"at least this belly means a lot of food" she noted, rubbing her immense bump, as she felt some gentle squirms. "silver linings i guess"

She kept eating, as she set up a film on her laptop, deciding to take it easy for the rest of the day. she lay on the sofa, caressing her belly slowly, enjoying her afternoon. maybe this whole pregnancy thing isn't going to be all bad.

----------

MJ had decided to get into work early. She strode through the quiet office, her pale green jumper only just covering her belly, a pale sliver of skin bared at her waistband. She dropped her stuff off at her desk, before making her way towards Robbie's office, mentally preparing herself to break the news to him. she stood outside the door for a moment before she finally built up the courage to give it a knock.

"Come in" he said, looking up from his desk as MJ walked in.

"Hi Robbie, I uh... I need to talk to you about something" she said, slowly walking to his desk and sitting opposite him.

"Okay" he said, sounding slightly suspicious "what is it MJ?"

"Im pregnant" she blurted out, hoping to get this ordeal over soon.

He looked her in slight shock, then down towards her belly, noting the very large swell of her belly. "well you've certainly kept it under wraps for a while"

"yeah, i guess you could say that" she replied.

"well I'm happy for you" he smiled at her. "But you're going to have to keep coming in till we can properly file for your maternity leave. Had you told us earlier it would have been easier"

She sighed. "I understand, i guess i just got stubborn" she lied, a little annoyed that she would still be working. "how long will it take?"

"About two or so days, four at most" He said. "I'll send you the files you'll need to sign soon. Congratulations again"

"Thanks" she smiled, thinking to herself how much better that went than how she'd anticipated.

She made her way out of Robbie's office, a slight spring in her step, and a hand softly cradling her belly. All of a sudden she felt a pair of hands reaching from behind her, holding her belly and rubbing it excitedly. MJ turned around swiftly to see Betty fawning excitedly over her belly.

"Congratulations! Why didn't you say anything sooner?" She said, both hands all over her bump.

"Thanks!" MJ replied, smiling, masking her annoyance. "I just wanted to keep it under wraps. How did you find out anyway?"

"I was listing in on you and Robbie" MJ shot her a look. "what, its a habit" she grinned cheekily.

"don't you have work to do?" she asked, smirking a little.

"aw boo" betty laughed back a little. "i'll see you around MJ, maybe we could grab some lunch together?"

"yeah that would be nice" she smiled back at her, heading back to her desk.
111132111111111111111111.title: Week 3 begins (RESERVED)

1111321111111111111111111.content:
MJ took the next hour or so to do some more research into these break-ins. She thought to look into the company that the truck belonged to. She was able to make out the name yesterday, lucky enough that she was able to quickly write it down while she was on the street.

A quick search online didn't reveal too much at first glance. She rubbed her belly slowly, trying to quell the kicks inside as she looked through the webpages.

Nothing particularly noteworthy or interesting, until something caught her eye. It appeared that the company had been bought recently, not even a month ago. She tried to find out who had bought it, but the source appeared to be anonymous. Whoever it was had to have a decent amount of cash on their hands.

Mary Jane vowed to look deeper into it tomorrow, and saw Betty approach her desk.

"Hey! Ready to head out to lunch?" Betty asked.

MJ's stomach rumbled. "Yes. I thought you might have forgotten!"

Betty helped her up, and the two headed to a nearby deli.

Once they got their food and took a seat, Betty spent most of her time watching Mary Jane eat, nibbling on her own food in the meantime.

MJ was too occupied with her food to pay any mind to Betty. Suddenly, she felt pokes and prods to her massive belly, and saw the secretary feeling the round flesh.

"W-what are you doing, Betty?" she asked, a little flustered.

"I'm trying to get the babies to move!" Betty exclaimed with a smile.

"Babies? How did you know there's more than one in there?" MJ wondered.

She looked up at the pregnant journalist. "I mean, come on, MJ. You're huge!"

"Thanks..."

"Seriously, how did you hide this so well?" Betty asked.

Mary Jane shrugged. "It sort of just snuck up on me."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Back at the Bugle, MJ spent the rest of the day eating, heading to the bathroom, rubbing her belly, and doing some work.

As 5 o'clock hit, Mary Jane slowly rose from her chair and headed out, saying good night to Betty.

Walking down the street, she realized that she really needed some new clothes. Her largest shirts and jeans didn't fit her now, so she needed something that would come close to covering her larger pregnant form.

She waddled to a nearby department store and went to the women's clothing section. She hated the look of many of the maternity wear, but found some jeans that were stylish. The maternity bras weren't too bad, either. For the top half of her body, which would be the hardest to cover, she found some larger shirts and blouses that did the job for now.

In the back of her mind, she could only wonder just how long they'd fit her. How much bigger would she be a week from now? Or even a day?

She trudged up and down the aisles, drawing looks from employees and customers that she ignored. After paying for the clothes, which came to a surprisingly high total, and left.

The rest of her night was uneventful. She grabbed dinner on the way home, and spent the last few hours of her day rubbing her belly and feeling the kicks of the eight growing lives within her. Maybe this pregnancy wouldn't be so bad after all.
1111321111111111111111111.title: Later that day (RESERVED)

11113211111111111111111111.content:
MJ woke up to her belly squirming and looked down, bracing for the inevitable. Her belly had indeed grown overnight, pushing her covers off it and baring it to the cool air. She sat up yawning and rubbing it absentmindedly. Sighing and starting the challenge of getting out of bed, heaving her heavy body up. She had started to get into the routine of things, and was starting to get to grips with her size, despite how much she kept growing.

Waddling into the kitchen, she started to make herself breakfast, putting on several slices of toast in quick succession, munching them down quickly after they popped up, covering them in peanut butter. She looked down at her sizeable bust and brushed off the mess off crumbs, reaching into her cleavage to get rid of the crumbs between each breast. She headed back to her room to get dressed for work, still munching on a slice of toast.

Mary-jane picked out a pair of dark blue maternity jeans, a loose white long sleeve shirt and a deep red flannel shirt. She pulled the jeans up her legs, finding her new jeans far easier than her non-maternity jeans, thankfully. She got them to her waist and was massively thankful that she could actually button them up, with a small underpart on her belly. She pulled on her shirt and again found it far more comfortable than regular clothes. It managed to reach over her belly and breasts, leaving only the tiniest sliver of underbelly. She pulled over the flannel shirt and admired the outfit in the mirror.

”huh. These maternity clothes aren't half bad” MJ smirked, posing a little for herself. ”here's hoping they'll last for a while longer”

She grabbed her bag and phone, and left her apartment, heading to work with a slight spring in her step.

----------

At work, MJ spent her morning doing some writing up of her current case, sprucing up her notes and turning them from simple scrawls to a readable article. She yawned and grabbed her bag, pulling out some sandwiches she had bought from a nearby deli. While eating the first, she thought about heading out to keep investigating, but part of her knew that Robbie wouldn't let her, given how pregnant she was. She finished her lunch and had an idea, standing up and brushing off her shirt as she waddled to Robbie's office.

”Hey Robbie?” she said, leaning in and knocking on the door.

”Come in MJ” he replied, glancing up from his computer.

”Actually I can't stop now, I was just coming to say I had a doctors appointment,” she said, hoping her lie would hold up.

”Oh right, yeah that's fine” he added, smiling at her. ”you'll be back later, right?”

”Yeah I think so” she smiled back, putting on her signature denim jacket. ”I'll see you later then”

With that, she turned and left, picking up her bag from her desk and waving bye to Betty. Worked like a charm she smiled to herself, stepping out into the street. She looked down at her phone, checking the address she had found, and started towards the nearest subway station, wanting to save her energy if she had to sneak around upon arrival.

She stepped into the subway car, holding her bulging belly, and searched for a seat, finding them all full. She sighed and looked to the speciality seats, seeing them full as well. She was about to resign herself to standing, but thankfully an older woman stood up and offered her a seat.

”I've been in the same spot dear” she smiled at MJ. ”Being on your feet all the time starts to hurt”

MJ smiled back to her. ”thank you, yeah this belly is way too heavy” she joked, patting it for emphasis.

”may I feel it?” she asked.

”uh sure go ahead” She replied, considering it briefly in her mind.

The woman carefully rubbed her bulging belly, admiring it and how big it was. MJ smiled softly as she patted it and caressed it. ”wow you've got some strong babies here” she beamed.

”yeah they are, keep mama up all night with it” she laughed, glad of the woman's kindness.

Eventually, the woman got off the train, saying goodbye and good luck to MJ, smiling sweetly. A few stops after that it was time for MJ to get off the train, balancing herself as the train stopped. She waddled off and out of the station, heading towards the address. She came to see a small dingy looking warehouse, with a few small lights flickering inside.

”Bingo” she smirked, heading towards it, trying to find a hidden way inside.

----------

She had found a small hole in one of the walls, and squeezed her way through it. She hadn't anticipated how much her belly would have gotten in the way, which helped to explain the small tear in the hem of her shirt.

She was crouched behind a stack of crates, trying to figure a way through the warehouse. The place was heavily guarded, and her belly made speaking around a lot harder than it used to. She saw a window as one of the guards turned around, and bolted to another stack of crates.

She slipped behind them, but froze up when she heard the crates shift as she pushed them too hard. She could hear footsteps approaching her and prepared herself, hoping she'd be able to get the slip on the guard.

He turned the corner, and all of a sudden saw a fist flying towards his face, followed by one to his stomach and another to the face. MJ breathed a quiet sigh of relief as the guard fell unconscious. those self defense lessons definitely paid off. She looked out over her cover and saw that the doorway was unguarded, pacing rapidly towards it before the other guard returned.

Inside the the room she saw a sight that came as a surprise to her. At one end of the room was a computer, where Spider-man himself was stood hacking it for information.
