From another corner of the room a guard was quietly approaching him with a stun-baton in his hand. He was getting closer and closer, and MJ started forward.

Peter had just successfully hacked the terminal, pumping his fist gladly. He turned around and saw a thug about to jab his ribs with a baton. Just as he swung down, a large object slammed into his head, knocking him out cold onto the floor. He looked up and saw

”MJ?” Peter said, confused. ”What are you doing he-” he started, before noticing her belly.

”We should probably talk” she replied.
11113211111111111111111111.title: The next day

111132111111111111111111111.content:
Twenty minutes later, Mary Jane and Peter found themselves at Mick's diner sitting across from each other in a booth.

MJ had already finished her meal, while Peter had barely touched his.

Peter couldn't keep his mouth closed or his eyes off of MJ's massive stomach.

"Is...is it mine?" he asked.

Mary Jane shook her head. "No, Peter. They aren't."

"Okay. Wait, then who is? Wait, did you say 'they'?"

MJ smiled lightly. Oh, he was so out of his element here. It was actually kind of endearing.

"There is no father. It's a long story. A few weeks ago I...took a tour at Oscorp," she started to explain.

"Alright..." Peter said, not sure if he followed where she was going.

"It was an unscheduled trip. I got an anonymous tip that something shady was going on there."

"Did the radioactive spiders not give you enough of a hint?" Peter grinned.

"This was different. I was able to get into a lab, one that looked top secret. Inside, there was this serum in a vial. I picked it up, accidentally dropped it and spilled some of it onto myself when some scientists stopped by. After that, I got sick. Then, the belly came. I finally went to the doctor yesterday. Somehow, some way, that serum got me pregnant. And it's progressing at a rapid rate."

Peter's eyes were wide. "How..."

"I'm still trying to figure it out, too. I can't even imagine how you must have felt when you saw me," MJ said.

"Right. You...you said 'they' earlier? As in, there's m-more than one in there?" Peter asked, fidgeting in his seat.

"Yeah. There's actually eight in here..." she replied, patting her belly.

"Eight?"

"Eight."

"How?"

"That's what I'm trying to figure out. Was it some type of fertility drug that hasn't been tested yet?" MJ wondered.

"I guess it's being tested now," Peter added.

Mary Jane rolled her eyes.

"So why were you in the warehouse?" she asked.

"Lately I've been following a series of break-ins. Really suspicious. They're just taking random computer parts," he noted.

"Really? I've been looking into that, too," MJ said.

Peter raised an eyebrow. "You find out who's behind it yet?"

Mary Jane shook her head.

"Me neither. Well, I can handle it alone from here. You shouldn't be putting yourself in danger. Especially in your condition," he said.

"Peter, I'm pregnant. I don't have a terminal illness," she sighed.

"Well, these guys aren't going to care if you're pregnant. If they find you, they'll make sure you're out of the picture one way or another."

"I can handle it. Plus, isn't pregnancy strength a thing?"

"Fine. Okay."

MJ smiled, then yawned. "Ugh. These babies are taking a lot out of me. I think I'm gonna head home," MJ said, slowly rising from the booth, her belly grazing against the table.

"Alright. Do you want me to walk you home or anything?" Peter offered.

"I'm fine, Pete. It's only a few blocks," MJ said.

"Right. Well, I guess I'll see you around?"

"I think it'd be a good idea to keep in touch if we find out anything else about this case. Maybe sometime next week we can meet up and try to piece this thing together," Mary Jane said.

Peter nodded. "That'd be a good idea. My place or yours?"

They made their way outside of the diner.

"Come on. You're gonna make a pregnant girl walk all the way to your apartment?" MJ smiled.

"You can always get a taxi. Alright, alright. So your place. That sounds like a plan," he said.

"I'll even make some food. Better me than you. Those poor dumplings," she laughed.

"You're never going to let me live that down, are you? Good night, MJ," he said, walking in the direction of his apartment.

"Good night. And Pete?" she said, stopping from her waddle back to her apartment.

"Yeah?"

"It was good to see you again."

"It was good to see you too, Mary Jane."
111132111111111111111111111.title: An awkward conversation

1111321111111111111111111111.content:
MJ turned and began the walk home. Well at this point it was more of a waddle if she was honest with herself. Lucky for her it wasn’t a long walk, and she was home before long. She flopped down on the sofa, tired after a long day, especially after the warehouse. She pulled up her dirtied shirt, baring her enormous belly, andstarted slowly rubbing it.

”this does feel kinda nice” MJ mused to herself, as she felt gentle kicks from in her womb. ”i guess I'm starting to enjoy this more”

She tucked her shirt underneath her breasts and continued to run her belly, stopping occasionally as a kick poked out or moved across her belly. She poked back after a few kicks, hoping to elicit a response, to some effect, the babies squirming back. It made her giggle slightly, which surprised her. She smiled sweetly at her belly as she resigned herself to bed.

”goodnight babies” she whispered, drifting off to sleep, hands on her belly.

----------

That morning MJ woke up before her alarm started blaring. She had sat in bed for a few minutes exploring her growing belly, which had expanded a fair amount overnight, so much so that her growth was beginning to worry her a bit, more than usual. After the usual routine of heaving herself out of bed, MJ waddled to the bathroom, warming up the shower.

She stepped inside and almost moaned at the feeling of hot water running over her swollen body, biting her lip at the last second. She cradled her big bump and let the water flow over it, soothing her tight skin, and starting to rub soapy water all over it. The shower was relaxing for her, a time for her to think.

She dried herself off, thoroughly rubbing her bulging bump with her towel, trying to dry the entire thing. She struggled a little with the underbelly but managed to get it done eventually. She stepped out of the bathroom with a towel wrapped around her waist, and another tied over her hair. Grabbing a bra, she picked up her phone, calling her doctor to book an appointment. Her growth was starting to worry her, especially how much she kept growing each night.

”Hi, can I book an appointment? Tomorrow is preferable” MJ said, getting dressed as she spoke. ”Tomorrow afternoon is great, thank you”

She finished getting dressed, a black pair of maternity slacks pulled just over a portion of her belly, with a blue and white striped jumper over a plain t-shirt. She looked over herself in the mirror, noting that her jumper looked to be struggling to cover her whole belly, much to her annoyance. Sighing she slipped into some shoes and left for work, grabbing some breakfast from a bakery on the way.

----------

Work, for the most part, was uneventful, mostly just typing up her notes and a smattering of congratulations from coworkers. Betty had come over to chat to her a few times, talking to her about her pregnancy mostly, and complimenting her outfits as well, pointing out how they ’emphasised the belly, but in a good way’.

MJ was sat at her desk, resting a packet of chips on her immense bump as she scanned over the information she had on the current case. Something about it was familiar to her, and it was bugging her. She rubbed her belly and picked up one of the photos of the van, scanning the logo, trying to work out what felt so familiar about the whole thing.

”someone stealing tech, a show company,” she said, annoyed that she still couldn't figure it out. ”magic logo-”

It hit her. It all made so much sense now, why it was so familiar to her. The tech, the magic, the special effects. She and Peter had been through it all before, a few years ago.

”Mysterio!” she exclaimed, pumping her fists in the air, spilling her chips onto her desk.

She cleared up her mess and immediately got to sending a text to Peter. Its Mysterio! He's back, that's why so much tech has gone missing she typed, hitting send. A reply came through shortly after ; Of course! Makes sense, great job. I'll investigate some more tonight. She smiled, proud of herself. Her pride was interrupted by a hand on her shoulder.

”Hey, MJ. We've got a meeting now” Said Betty from behind her, offering a hand to help her up.

”Oh right, yeah” She replied, taking her hand as both women heaved her up.

The two of them made their way to the conference room, which was slowly filling up. Betty took her seat next to Robbie, and Mary-Jane went to take her usual seat opposite her. She sat down in the chair and found it to be very tight, not only on her hips but on her belly as well, squeezing both slightly. She shifted uncomfortably, bumping against the table and knocking over one of the glasses on top, spillkng its contents.

”Sorry” she smiled in embarrassment, picking it up and sitting still, hands on top of her bump.

”Don't worry about it” Robbie sighed, smirking a little. ”We’ll start with you miss Watson”

”Well I looked I to the robberies and found that they were all under similar circumstances, and upon further investigation, and a little help from my ’contact’ I've been able to draw up a good article” She said, presenting her story to the group.

”Sounds good, keep at it but don't overdo it, especially in your condition” Robbie replied.

”Im pregnant, not sick” she quipped back, garnering a few chuckles.

”Whatever you say” Robbie said, before continuing along with the meeting.
1111321111111111111111111111.title: The next day (RESERVED)

11113211111111111111111111111.content:
The rest of the day was uneventful, and MJ found herself packing her things a few hours before work was supposed to let out. She was eager to see what the doctor had to say about her growth. She could have sworn that she'd gotten bigger over the last few hours. Her sweater definitely seemed tighter.

Betty watched her waddle towards her desk as she made her way to the door. The secretary looked at the pregnant woman with a smile.

"You leaving, Mary Jane?" she asked.

MJ stopped, hands pressing into the small of her back, which accentuated her massive bump even more.

"Yeah. Got a doctor's appointment," Mary Jane sighed.

"Oh. Well, I hope the babies are alright!"

MJ nodded. "I'm sure they are. They're just getting big."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Mary Jane looked at her doctor as he pulled the sonogram machine towards her. She was lying down on the examination table, her immense belly bared. She looked at it, noticing that the vast dome luckily had no stretch marks.

"I'm not crazy, right? I'm definitely bigger than when you looked at me last week?" MJ asked.

The doctor looked at her as he turned the machine on. "I didn't want to be the one to say it, but I would agree. No matter, we'll find out what's going on shortly."

MJ's belly was covered in gel, and the doctor maneuvered the wand across the massive, tight skin.

Almost immediately, the doctor frowned, his eyes squinting. "Hmm..."

Mary Jane looked up at him, trying to get a read on what he was thinking.

"What in the..." he trailed.

"What's wrong? Are the babies okay?" she asked, a hint of fear in her voice.

The doctor shook his head. "They're actually looking very healthy. All eight of them. But they look much more further developed than they were last week. When I looked at you at the last appointment they were around 18 weeks along. Now they're nearly 30."

"But they're fine other than that?" MJ wondered.

"Yes. But I'd like to keep an eye on you from here on out. We should schedule another appointment for early next week."

MJ nodded. "Okay. That works for me."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Mary Jane took a moment to catch her breath once she arrived at her apartment. This belly was really starting to take its toll on her. She relieved her bladder and caught her reflection in the mirror. Her sweater was now holding on for dear life, struggling to contain the massive growth.

She removed it and threw it on her bed. MJ looked down and rubbed her belly as the lives within kicked and squirmed.

That sweater was by far the biggest thing she owned. Now what would she do?

Shaking her head, Mary Jane cooked up a large dinner then went to sleep, the babies tumbling and pushing within her increasingly cramped womb.
11113211111111111111111111111.title: Carry on (RESERVED)

111132111111111111111111111111.content:
MJ slowly heaved herself out of bed, her belly hindering her from doing so quickly. She steadied her self against the wall and waddled to the shower, striding past a few shopping bags with her new maternity clothes inside.

She had spent most of yesterday shopping for new clothes that would cover her belly, knowing that she’d outgrow them sooner or later. After she had finished her shopping trip, she had headed home to her apartment, and had Betty over for a catchup. They talked pretty much exclusively about her pregnancy and how she was doing, and, at Betty’s insistence, showed off some of her new clothes. Thinking back, MJ thought it had been a good day,

She stepped into the bathroom and started to strip down, watching herself in the mirror, and looking down at her enormous belly, occasional kicks popping up now and then. She stroked it slowly as she turned on the water, rushing over her swell. It still blew her mind how fast this had happened, and how big she was. Sure she did have eight babies in her belly, but she never expected to get quite this huge so fast.

The water stopped as she stepped out of the shower, beginning to dry off herself, starting on her belly and working her way over her body, struggling because of her bump. She threw on a sports bra, as it was one of the only bras she had that could contain her growing bust, and a pair of sweatpants that hugged her newly curvy figure, almost emphasising her size.

A quick waddle to the kitchen, and Mary Jane got down to cooking herself some breakfast, making herself pancakes, bacon, eggs. The smell while she cooked made her even hungrier, as her stomach grumbled and her babies squirmed eagerly, hungry as well.

“Calm down, im nearly done” sje joked to her belly, patting it gently.

She settled on her couch, using her belly as a table, and dug into her hefty breakfast, turning on the tv while she ate, surfing through the channels. There was some news report on Spideys recent activities, some crappy looking reality show, a few quiz shows. She settled on an old rerun of one of her favourite shows growing up, listening to it absent-mindedly as she ate her breakfast.

“Mmmh that hit the spot” she moaned, rubbing her belly soothingly as she finished the last of her meal.

She saw her laptop on the coffee table and decided to get some work done, and strained to reach for it from her comfy position, grunting as she tried to edge it closer. Sighing, she sat up and picked it up, resting it on her belly and shuffling to get comfortable again. She opened it up and resumed where she’d left of with her work, building up the case.

Her phone buzzed. She glanced at it and saw a message from Peter, asking “We still on for tonight?”. She chuckled at his message, and replied quickly “yep, make sure to bring snacks”. She put her phone down and carried on working, waiting for Peter to get there
111132111111111111111111111111.title: Week 4 begins (RESERVED)

1111321111111111111111111111111.content:
Peter strode down the hallway of Mary Jane’s apartment building, a bag of food in his hands. He had done this pretty often in the past, the two of them collaborating a few times when they dated, so it was just like old times. Except this time MJ was very, very pregnant. He mulled over how it had happened to her, with her sneaking into Oscorp and knocking it onto herself. It was weird, and he lived a pretty weird life if he was honest, having fought a weird and wonderful rogues gallery for a few years, and yet this still stood out. As he was deep in thought he came to MJs door, and hesitated for a second before knocking on her door.

“Come in!” MJ called from behind the door “I’m a little busy!”

Peter reached for the handle and pushed open the door, stepping inside. He turned to the kitchen to put down the food he had brought and saw MJ turned away, cooking something on the oven, hunched over slightly. She was wearing a pair of very tight looking sweatpants that hugged her figure, emphasising her size, and highlighting just how much her body had changed in a few weeks. He drew his eyes away from her butt, and saw her mostly bare back, save for the straps of a sports bra. Peter gulped. This was gonna be a long evening for him.

“Hey Pete” she called over her shoulder “just a second”

She finished whatever it was she was doing and slowly turned around to face Peter, revealing her enormous and uncovered baby-filled belly to him. He watched in awe as she turned, watching her belly quiver slightly as she moved. She was a lot bigger than when he had last seen her, and miraculously had no stretch marks marring the tight surface of her belly. Mary Jane watched Peters shocked expression start to blush as she showed off her bump, and chuckled quietly to herself.

“W-want any help?” Peter finally stammered.

“You don’t have a good track record in the kitchen, Parker” She smirked, leaning against the counter.

“Hey I’m not that bad” he replied defensively “I-I can do some stuff” he added indignantly.

“Come on, I’m just teasing” she smiled, giggling at how flustered Peter was.

He took his jacket off and rolled up his sleeves, stepping into the small kitchen, ready to help. “What can i do?” He asked.

“You can start by chopping vegetables for me” she said, turning to grab a bag of carrots and peppers, and bumping her backside into Peter “Sorry, not much room these days”

Peter chuckled in reply, and got down to cutting up vegetables for her. The pair started to get into a rhythm, but it was soon disturbed as Peter reached for another bowl and felt himself pressed against the side of MJ’s belly, causing both of them to blush a little. they returned to their jobs, both trying to avoid another collision, to no avail. I'm too big! MJ thought to herself, opening a bag of chips, as she felt Peter back up into her again, pushing her forward, her belly tipping over some jars

"damn it" she sighed to herself, snacking on a handful of chips "this thing is like a wrecking ball"

Peter snorted to himself at the comment and continued chopping, arms tucked into himself. Every now and then he could hear MJ eating something and he rolled his eyes. After a few more minutes of very cramped work, and a few more bumps and accidents, they finished cooking, and began setting up their feast on the couch. Well more of a feast for MJ, Peter thought her appetite was even more than his, and he had an enhanced one!

"So got any new leads on the case?" he asked her as he sat down.

"mmh Yeah" she replied, finishing a mouthful of food "I figured out who's behind all of this! It's Mysterio!"

"Of course! It al makes sense! MJ you're a genius!" he exclaimed, starting to reach for a hug, then settling for a high five.

"I always was the brains of the operation wasn't I" she smirks, returning the high five "the tech is for something big, so he must be planning a heist or something. I'll let you do the science stuff" she added, stuffing her mouth full of food.

They talked away for a while as they ate, mostly about the case, their next moves, and the like. Then the conversation began to shift, to her pregnancy, and what she was going to do.

"so what's the plan after you... you know" Peter started.

"You mean give birth?" she chuckled "I don't know. I've been so caught up in the case, I never really thought much about it"

she stroked her belly as she felt some kicks and squirms "I guess I'll give them up for adoption. Im not ready to be a mom, and I do not earn enough to take care of eight babies"

MJ looked up at Peter for a response, but found that he was just looking towards her belly, as it squirmed, an occasional kick poking out. She grabbed his hand and gently placed it on her tight belly for him, watching his face blush a little as he began to feel the kicks beneath his hand. He slowly moved it around, feeling more and more movement as he explored her belly, almost in awe of it, from the size, to the constant movement. A sudden loud growl broke the silence.

"sorry" MJ said shyly "still hungry"

Peter rolled his eyes "I'll order you a pizza"

While he dialled in the number and ordered a large pepperoni for her, Mary Jane could feel something in her stomach. she rubbed her belly, pressing against, all of a sudden letting out some gas, much to her and Peters embarrassment. She blushed deep red and shrunk away into the sofa, mouthing a Sorry! towards Peter. He finished ordering and sat down again, and after an awkward silence, the conversation pick up again, discussing what he should do to try and stop Mysterio before he could strike out. The doorbell ringing snapped them out of it.

"I'll get it" Pete smiled, running to grab it, sparing MJ from having to stand up.

He handed her the box, and upon opening it, she immediately began devouring the pizza, Peter watching and wonder whether to be scared of her or a little proud. If she's not careful, she's actually going to pop he thought to himself, as she finished off her seventh slice.
1111321111111111111111111111111.title: Peter arrives (RESERVED)

11113211111111111111111111111111.content:
Mary Jane woke up with a smile on her face. It was nice to spend time with Peter again, even if they weren't together anymore. But it was for the best. When they were dating, she was always worrying about him, and he would worry about her. Those worries didn't completely go away when they broke up, but it was safer for MJ now.

She grunted as she tried to sit up. There was definitely a lot more weight in her belly than there was the day before. "Serves me right for eating so much," she groaned.

Her room was dark, so she couldn't tell for sure, but it certainly felt like it was much bigger. Mary Jane had always heard that women typically grew the most when they were in their third trimester, and since she technically was in the third trimester as well, it made sense for the growth to really ramp up now. The thought was fairly frightening for her. She was so big as it was. How much more could her body take?

She finally was able to stand after a five minute endeavor. As she got upright, her knees suddenly buckled from the weight. Mary Jane was able to recover before she fell, and took in deep breaths as she rubbed her belly. "Hoo, boy. You all need to stop getting so big. I have a feeling that's gonna fall on deaf ears, though."

The babies moved around in response. MJ placed her hands on her back for support as she slowly waddled towards the bathroom to shower. She truly had no idea how she'd be able to work in this state, but she guessed that she was about to find out.

She switched on the light and took a good look at herself in the bathroom mirror. Her belly was unbelievably huge. It was truly unnatural. The pale, round skin was stretched incredibly tight, but there still weren't any stretch marks. She slowly turned to the side to get another look at it and accidentally knocked off some makeup that was sitting on the sink.

Mary Jane sighed as her belly gurgled. She was still full from her feast last night. If she waited until later to pick up the makeup, she'd certainly be bigger, so she might as well get it over with. MJ spread her legs far apart and carefully squatted down. Any wrong movement and she'd fall, and she wasn't certain she'd be able to get back up.

As she got down as low as she could and picked up the makeup, she heard another unfortunately familiar noise escape her body. More gas. As gross as it was, she supposed it wasn't too much of a surprise. The babies were fighting for room with her insides, which meant that there was a lot less space than usual. She shook her head and stepped in the shower.

Getting dressed would be interesting, since she had likely outgrown the larger clothes that she recently purchased. Pants with buttons were out of the question, so she opted for a stretchy long skirt and a blue and red striped long sleeve shirt. Even though she pulled the skirt up high, there was a good portion of her massive belly revealed.

After eating a large breakfast, she put on her jacket and slipped on some flats and headed off to work.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Mary Jane plodded towards her desk, trying to avoid all of the eyes that were on her. Betty looked up from her computer and smiled. "There she is!"

"Yeah...here I...am..." MJ huffed.

"You look amazing!" Betty exclaimed.

Mary Jane rolled her eyes. "Really? I feel like a whale."

She sat down at her desk, the chair creaking loudly. She was surprised that it could even hold her at this point. Robbie emerged from his office. "Can I talk to you for a minute, MJ?" he asked.

He wished that he would have asked her before she sat down, but that was out of her control. "Sure thing, Robbie."

She tried and failed to get up. The whole office watched as she struggled to stand.

"Need a hand, Mary Jane?" Betty offered.

Her pride would not allow help with this. How pathetic would it be if she couldn't even stand by herself?

"No. No, I've got it. Just...just give me a second. I'll be right there, Robbie."

"Take all the time you need," Robbie replied.

Mary Jane continued to try and fail to get herself upright. The weight of her belly was really starting to get to her.

"You sure you've got this?" Betty asked.

"Yes!"

MJ gritted her teeth and slowly stood with all of her strength, her legs shaking mightily. She panted and patted her belly. "See? Easy...easy as pie."

Her stomach rumbled. She frowned and waddled into Robbie's office as he closed the door behind her.

"Take a seat, MJ," Robbie said as he sat down at his desk.

"It'd probably be best if I didn't," she replied, placing her hands on the small of her back.

"Fair enough. So how are you feeling?"

"Very, very pregnant," Mary Jane said, smiling weakly.

"I bet. So I just got word that your paperwork went through. Starting tomorrow you'll be on maternity leave," he stated.

"Really? So this'll be my last day?"

Robbie nodded. "For a few months. But during this time, I want you to take it easy. Got it? You're...clearly dealing with a lot there, and I want you to be safe."

Mary Jane rolled her eyes, but nodded. If only he knew how close she was to cracking this case. "You got it, Robbie."

"Good. That's all. Thanks so much for all you do, MJ. You've been a trooper."

"Oh, it's nothing," she smiled.

Mary Jane turned around and opened the door, and saw all of her coworkers gathered around. A large banner reading CONGRATULATIONS, MARY JANE was draped on the wall.

"SURPRISE!!!" they all yelled.

MJ placed her hands on her chest as she welled up with emotion. "You all did this for me?"

"There's nobody else named Mary Jane here, is there?" Eddie Brock asked.

"You have shown so much strength throughout this process. We're really gonna miss you," Robbie said.

The rest of the day was largely spent chatting with her coworkers and eating cake and chips. As she swallowed a large bite of cake and Betty lovingly rubbed her monstrous baby-filled belly, MJ realized that she was happy. Tired, huge, but happy.
11113211111111111111111111111111.title: The next day (RESERVED)

111132111111111111111111111111111.content:
MJ left the office happy. It had been nice to see all her co-workers one last time before she left, and everyone had been so nice, Betty especially. She'd planned the whole thing in a few days, and shed done it perfectly. Of course, her joy was short lived as she waddled to the nearest subway station. The party had left her tired, and with her belly getting bigger every day, she was more tired than ever, and she was finding it increasingly harder to walk without having to stop to catch her breath every few steps. And the looks from strangers walking by did nothing to help either.

When she finally made it to the subway station, she slumped onto a bench for a moment, waiting for her train to arrive. she leaned back sighing, noting each ache in her swollen body. Her breasts felt particularly sore aching terribly, and her clothes felt like they were digging in, more than ever.

She heaved herself up at the sound of her train, waddling as fast as she could to try and get a seat, much to her discomfort. The train was packed, and there seemed to be no free seats. Great, just what I needed today she sighed to herself. A woman sat in front of her stood up and tapped her shoulder, but by the time MJ looked up, an older man had snagged the seat, leaving her stood for the rest of the way, holding her belly to try and lift some weight away. Sudden kicks and squirms pulled Mary Jane from her train of thought, and she began rubbing her moving bump to try and soothe the occupants inside, who seemed to ignore her.

As she massaged, a slightly pained look on her face, she could feel something poking her underbelly. The problem was that the rest of her belly blocked her view, and there was no room to turn and see. She shifted a little bit as the poking continued, starting to annoy her more and more, and she saw a little girl staring up at her belly and poking it. MJ said nothing, too tired to bother, resigning that the poking wasn't that annoying. Thankfully the girls mother stopped her soon after, and scolded her, to the kids embarrassment. The mom apologised on her rather embarrassed daughters behalf, MJ replying with a tired smile. The poking had pushed her babies into another kicking frenzy, and this time they took aim at her bladder.

"Not now, please!" she spoke to herself, crossing her legs as the train pulled into her stop.

She waddled off quickly, desperate for the bathroom, not looking where she was headed. A man collided into her, thankfully not very hard, but enough that both were a little dazed. He quickly walked on, ignoring MJ, who was left standing catching her breath. All of a sudden she felt something wet seeping through her shirt. Praying that the man had spilled a drink on her, she looked down and blushed, seeing two little wet patches growing across her shirt.

"God damnit!" she growled, pulling her jacket across her chest, trying to cover it as best she could, to little success.

She waddled around looking for a bathroom, and found her way into a nearby store. She approached the woman behind the counter, and asked her politely if there was a bathroom.

"Just down the hall there" she pointed away.

"Thanks, so much" MJ replied, turning towards the bathroom.

"she is way too big to be wearing those clothes" she heard the Shopkeeper mutter under her breath "let alone be out in public"

It stung. A lot. with how her day had started going, it did nothing to help her mood, and she held back a tear as she headed for the bathroom.

----------

After what had felt like the longest journey of her life, Mary Jane finally arrived home. She shut her door and made her way to the bathroom, the babies adamant to use her bladder as target practice. MJ looked at her reflection in the mirror. She was a mess. Her hair was frizzed, and she could feel herself sweating the longer she waited. She looked away, not wanting to dwell on it any longer than she had to.

She felt her stomach grumbling, and almost ran to the kitchen, clearing the fridge of all she could find, carrying as much as she could into her room, and began to feast. Thank god for leftovers she thought, devouring some pasta from the night before with Peter. As she ate she swore she could feel herself growing, and put a hand to her belly, taking a deep breath as her mind started to race through everything that had happened.

"Maybe there is such a thing as too big" she grumbled to herself, her belly feeling tighter than ever before. "Maybe I might actually pop"

She continued to worry, and the more she worried, the more she ate. Her meal began to run out, and she took another trip to the bathroom, before laying down in bed and attempting to get comfortable. It was a struggle, and she tossed and turned, feeling too hot or too cold in some position, or she couldn't breathe in another. then she had to keep heaving herself out of bed to the bathroom, thanks to the relentless movement from inside her belly, and trips to the kitchen for more snacks as well.

She sat on her bed, holding her belly, crying quietly to herself. It was all getting too much for her. All of it, the size, the eating, the pains. she was starting to hate it.

----------

MJ woke slowly. she felt awful, recalling last nights events, and her lack of any good sleep. She turned over and slowly sat up, breathing heavy as her belly nearly pinned her to the bed. Huffing to herself, she began the morning ritual of heaving herself out of bed, struggling with her newfound weight, something she had grown to expect with each new day.

She stepped into the bathroom and watched herself in the mirror. she pulled up what little of her shirt was covering her immense swell, and stroked it curiously. her skin was beginning to grow red, the strain of her constant growth taking an obvious toll on her body. Rubbing it, it felt so much tighter than before, and each movement inside was beginning to feel dangerous to her health.

Finishing in the bathroom, she headed for the kitchen, anticipating her stomach grumbling within a few minutes. Setting herself a hearty breakfast, she took note that she would need to restock her food soon, especially with her rapidly increasing appetite. As she ate, she opened her laptop and began doing some work on the case, taking a look at some of Peters notes, and her own, trying to work out Mysterio's next move. She began to see a pattern in the warehouses, and priced together a rough idea of where they might strike next.

"Brains of the operation" she smirked to herself, eating another mouthful of her breakfast.

Finishing her meal, she stood up, and headed to get changed. She put on another stretchy skirt, with some more mobility around the legs, and a plain white shirt, which left a portion of her immense belly bared for all to see. MJ threw on her jacket, slipped on a pair of shoes, and headed for the door.
111132111111111111111111111111111.title: Mary Jane goes home (RESERVED)

1111321111111111111111111111111111.content:
The warehouse wasn't too far from her apartment, but it was far too long of a trek to walk there. Instead, she hailed a taxi, ignoring the shocked look of the cab driver, and arrived to the warehouse shortly after. It was abandoned, and appeared to have been that way for quite a while. But if she was right, Mysterio's henchmen would be arriving at any moment.

This pregnancy had affected nearly everything that Mary Jane took pride in, but her brains had hopefully remained as sharp as ever. She figured that she'd know one way or another soon enough. MJ found an unlocked door on the side of the warehouse and slipped inside carefully. She rubbed her belly as she took a look around. If her hands weren't on her belly at this point, they'd likely be on her back for support.

MJ grimaced as she took another look at herself. It was really impossible to believe how big she'd gotten. Her mind wandered for a moment, back to her trip to Oscorp. Why were they developing a serum that made women pregnant? And was the intent to get the consumer as pregnant as Mary Jane was? She would have to investigate that at a later point, likely after she had given birth. She was here for a reason, and she couldn't get distracted.

Mary Jane waddled around the warehouse, looking for any evidence that this was the right place. She found a shelf that was holding a cardboard box. Plodding over it, she carefully got on her tiptoes to grab it. Inside, she saw the same computer parts that had been stolen.

"Bingo," she smiled, a few hard kicks to her ribs instantly making her grunt.

Outside, she could hear the screeching of tires. The henchmen were here. MJ put the box back on the shelf and looked for a place where she'd be out of sight. She found another shelf that was full of useless items. Hiding behind would conveniently conceal her but give her a clear sight of the henchman. She waddled as quickly as she could to it. As soon as she got behind it, four masked men walked in the warehouse.

"Alright, take a quick look around. They should be here somewhere. We don't wanna be here too long," one of them said.

The men spread out and began to search the warehouse. MJ wasn't close to the box of parts, but she did have a good view of it from her position. Surely enough, they found what they were looking for, but right before the henchman that found the parts could respond, Mary Jane felt a strong flurry of kicks to her ribs and bladder.

"OOF!"

MJ immediately knew that she made a huge mistake and covered her mouth, but it was too late.

"What the hell was that?" a henchman asked. "I've got the parts. You three go find our guest."

Mary Jane wasn't too far from the exit. But she'd have to be quiet and quick in order to make it out, and in her condition that'd be a nearly impossible challenge. She had to try, however, so she began to make her way to the door. It was a precarious effort, her belly scraping against shelves and walls.

"Hey, you!"

Mary Jane froze and put her hands up. A henchman was behind her.

"Turn around slowly. No funny business."

"Slow is about all I can do at this point," she sighed.

MJ obliged and turned around, revealing her pregnancy to him.

"Holy SHIT," he said.

She nodded. "Yeah. That's how I thought you'd react."

At this point, the other henchmen had surrounded them.

"What do we do with her?"

"Take her with us. Let the boss figure it out."

Two henchmen grabbed her and led Mary Jane to the van. They helped her into the back, which was incredibly uncomfortable.

"Come on, boys. At least let the pregnant lady ride up front," she said.

"No chance. No funny. Got it? And you better not give birth back here, alright?"

MJ moaned as her massive stomach shifted and groaned. "Ugh. No promises."

~~~~~~~~~~~

The henchman shut the door, and soon enough the van took off. It wasn't a long ride to wherever they were headed, so Mary Jane was able to conclude that Mysterio's hideout was in Manhattan. Once the van stopped, she was taken inside, though with everything that she was dealing with, she unfortunately didn't get a great look at the location itself.

Inside the lair, they sat Mary Jane down on a steel chair and tied her up. At this point, even if she wasn't tied she probably couldn't go anywhere. The henchmen walked into another room, leaving her alone.

"Hey, boss. We found someone spying on us in the warehouse," one henchman said.

"Is that so? Why don't I have a talk with them?"

Mary Jane recognized the voice. It was Mysterio.

Mysterio walked into the room, his green cape scraping off of the ground. His face was obscured by the smoke-filled fishbowl mask that he wore.

"Well, well, well. What have we here? I recognize you. You're that reporter at the Daily Bugle. I'm not surprised that you've been snooping around," he said, getting close to her.

"Someone that's figured you out, Mysterio," she replied.

"Is that so? Because it looks like I've got someone that's way in over their head."

His hand drew close to her, but he stopped and retracted it. "I would touch you, but I'm afraid you'll pop if I do. What exactly do you have in there?"

Mary Jane was about to respond, but whimpered as strong movements made her entire stomach stretch and roll. It was incredibly painful, and she did all she could not to break into tears.

"I...I...know that you've been breaking into the warehouses! What are you planning?" she asked.

Mysterio cackled. "Very well. The tech I've been acquiring will let me break into banks across the city at the same time. It makes decoy versions of yours truly. The police will be helpless as they try to stop me. Since the real Mysterio won't be in any of the banks!"

"Wait...why would you tell me?"

"Because you won't be leaving here by the time my plan is sprung into action," he stated.

"You can't do that! What if I give birth?" she asked. It was partially a threat, but it was also a genuine worry of hers.

"I'm sure you'll be able to manage. Good luck!" Mysterio said, leaving the room.

He returned to the room the henchmen were in. "Boys, make sure she doesn't try anything. I'm leaving to begin the final preparations. I'll be back tomorrow before it begins."

She didn't know how long she sat there alone. MJ nearly fell asleep until a TWHIP made her sit up. Was that...?

A commotion broke out in the other room. Yells and collisions that Mary Jane could clearly hear but not see. It didn't last long. She could hear someone coming, and hoped that it'd be who she thought it was.

Sure enough, it was. Spider-Man stood before her.

"MJ?"

He hurried over to her and cut her loose. Spider-Man helped her up and they hugged, her gargantuan belly colliding into him.

"I didn't know if you were gonna come! Oh my god, Peter."

"Come on. Let's get you out of here."

Outside the warehouse, Peter changed out of his suit and got into his civilian wear.

"Are you okay?" he asked, seriously concerned about her.

Mary Jane was still catching her breath. "I'm alright. Just a little shaken up."

"No, I'm not talking about Mysterio. You're getting too big, MJ! Something isn't right, we need to get you to a hospital!" he exclaimed, gesturing to her stomach that was really showing the strain of eight nearly full-term babies.

"I'm...I'm fine," she insisted, though she wasn't sure if she actually believed it. "We need to finish this."

"Are you out of your mind? You STILL want to do this, even after you got kidnapped? This is exactly why we broke up in the first place! I can't keep having you in danger like this. You can't take this on by yourself!" he said.

"No, I can't. But we can take him down together. I know what he's planning!" she replied excitedly.

Peter sighed. "I'm not gonna win this one, am I?"

She smiled. "No chance, tiger."

"So what is he planning?" he asked.

Mary Jane's stomach growled. "Talk about it at Mick's?"
1111321111111111111111111111111111.title: MJ heads to the warehouse (RESERVED)

11113211111111111111111111111111111.content:
The situation was all too familiar. The two of them sat opposite each other over bowl of fries at Mick's diner. Of course there were a lot more than just fries, with MJ's appetite to thank for the huge amount of food on the table.

"What were you thinking?" Peter started, breaking the silence.

She rolled her eyes. They'd had this talk a million times. "You can't stop me after its happened"

"I can stop you from doing it again" he retorted. "or at least try"

She sighed heavily. "if I hadn't been there, I would never have heard Mysterio's plan"

Peter stopped looking so angry, a conflicted look taking over his face. "what is it"

"He's going to rob several city banks all at once, with the device he's building, which he'll be controlling remotely" she said.

He looked thoughtful for a minute "huh. I guess I could build something to help with that..." he mumbled.

"So you've got a plan then?" she asked.

"The beginnings of one. If I-we're gonna get the upper hand on him, I gotta go prepare" he started, standing up "I'll pay you back?"

She smiled "yeah sure. Keep me posted, okay?"

MJ finished her meal slowly, massaging her growing belly under the table. The babies had not stopped squirming since they arrived, but at this point she begun to get used to it, at least when they were light with their kicking. Finishing her food, she headed home, leaning her hands on her back for the long waddle home. She practically collapsed on her bed when she got home, to exhausted to focus on anything else.

----------

MJ woke to the telltale kicking. she opened her eyes and looked to watch her belly. What the... she thought to herself Theres no way I'm bigger. Her shirt, which had only just fit her belly, had ridden up further overnight, leaving a lot more skin on show. She rubbed her gravid swell slowly, taking in her new size, as the occupants within continued their kicking. It felt so much tighter now, and Mary Jane was now beginning to think she would genuinely explode. she heaved herself out of bed, leaning on the wall for support, waddling to the bathroom.

She turned to the mirror, anticipating bad news. Her belly had deepened its red tone, looking far more stretched, and a lot thinner than before. She could see veins stretched across it under the tight skin. It weighed a ton as well, and she could feel the strain on her legs and back. MJ could tell the end of her pregnancy was going to be soon, noting her belly was starting to drop a little lower, not a lot, but it was a sign that her body was preparing for labour.

Mary Jane waddled into her kitchen and threw together some breakfast, clearing her cabinets for something to eat, and settling on the sofa to eat, using her belly as a table. She checked her phone and saw she had a doctors appointment soon, so she sped up her meal, wolfing it down, with little regard to spills.

She waddled to her bedroom and rifled through her clothes for something to wear out, settling on another long, black skirt that she could pull (mostly) over her belly, and her stretchiest T-shirt, a blue and white striped design. Looking in the mirror, she sighed at how much of her belly was bared, stroking the sliver of skin ,annoyed.

"At least I won't have to pull my shirt up for the ultrasound" she chuckled to herself, slipping on her jacket and a pair of comfy shoes, heading for the door.
11113211111111111111111111111111111.title: One last dinner with Peter

Shaking her head, she decides to call up one of her teammates to have a sparing match. But who should she call?

A quick call and a trip to the gym later, Wanda was geared up and tossing hex bolts at Natasha Romanov, the Black Widow.

"Come on, is that all you got? I've seen Hydra Drones with better aim!" Black Widow mocks, rolling away from another bolt.

Wanda growls and fires again "Some of us haven't been trained to fight since puberty Natasha."

"No excuse, now come on! Or are you just gonna stand there and look pretty?" Natasha grins

Wanda takes a deep breath "You want to act like a brat? Fine! Lets see you handle this!" She says, charging a blast.

As she launched the spell, an odd ripple crosses through Wanda's body, causing the spell to expand. Hitting the ground, the room fills with light!

As the light dies, Wanda rubs her eyes "Shit! Sorry Nat, something weird just happened...Nat?"
