Her belly was far more prominent on her now, sticking out about two or three inches from her body. She looked at her breasts, which had also grown, bulging out of her bra slightly.

”What is going on with me?” she asked herself, looking at her body from all angles.

She walked out of her room to grab a drink from the mess. She let her mind wander as she walked, trying to determine what was going on with her. As she turned a corner, she didn't notice Mantis walking around it as well, and the two collided, both of them falling to the ground. Mantis was up first and grabbed onto Gamora, pulling her up by the arm, an. Steadying her with a gentle hand on her stomach.

”Are you okay?” she asked, sounding concerned.

”Yeah, I'm fine, just a little dazed, ” Gamora replied, rubbing her head.

”And the others?” Mantis asked.

”The who? What do you mean ’the others’?” Gamora replied, confused.

Mantis pulled her hands away from Gamora. ”It was nothing, just a little mistake, ” she said quickly. ”I am sorry, ”

Mantis walked briskly away, leaving Gamora confused as to what she had meant by ’the others’.
11531211111111111.title: A few days later (RESERVED)

115312111111111111.content:
Meanwhile, outside of the prison facility of Kyln, the other guardians flew low around the station in a civilian cruiser that they stole.

"Alright, we've got a few minutes until the guy that we're supposed to break out is supposed to head to the cafeteria, where we're supposed to meet him there. Now that I hear all that, there's a whole lot of supposed in this plan. Are you sure about this plan, Rocket?" Quill wondered.

"It's foolproof! Trust me, Peter. When have I ever led you astray?" he asked.

"If I told you every time that's happened we'd miss our window," Quill quipped back.

"I am Groot?"

"What did he say?" Drax asked Rocket.

"He was asking Quill about Gamora. Wanted to know if she was okay," he explained.

Peter put his hands up. "What? Why would I know?"

"Oh, come on! We saw you go into her room before we left. We saw her come out of yours last week. You don't have to hide it!" Rocket said.

"Yes. In fact, I've read that being open about your sexual relationships can be quite healthy," Drax added.

Quill raised an eyebrow. "You read? Anyways, she's fine. Just an illness or something."

"I don't know, Quill. I think she's lost a step," Rocket said.

Drax nodded. "I agree. And I suppose that means that I am the strongest warrior amongst us."

"What about me?" Peter asked.

"You?" Drax repeated.

Drax put his hand on Quill's shoulder and laughed. For two minutes straight.

Peter finally shook it off and checked his watch. "Alright, that's enough. It's time to go."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gamora stood in a desert. No. She looked around carefully. This wasn't always a desert. It was a wasteland. All around her was a thick layer of fog that she couldn't see past at all. The flat, beaten ground around her was visible though, and what she saw shocked her.

Peter, Rocket, Mantis, Drax, and Groot were all lying on the ground, sprawled around her. She didn't even have to examine them to know that they were dead. What happened? Where was she?

She suddenly had the urge to look down at herself, and instantly regretted it. Her belly was massive, sticking out at least two feet from her frame. She couldn't come close to wrapping her hands around it. It groaned and gurgled constantly.

The fog in front of her began to evaporate, and a large figure began to emerge from it. It was Thanos. As he approached her, Gamora stepped back. The back of her foot hit a rock, sending her to the ground.

Thanos stood over her. "Enjoy what time you have left with these fools, my daughter. For I will come soon, and you know what will happen when I do. One snap of my fingers, and everything you love will disappear."

Thanos raised his hand, and snapped.

Gamora woke up in a cold sweat. She gasped, desperately trying to catch her breath. Her shirt was damp from the sweat that she'd acquired in her dream. Was that all a dream? It felt so...so real...
115312111111111111.title: That night...

1153121111111111111.content:
Gamora was sat in bed, in slight shock at her condition. Only a day had passed since she had last had a proper look at herself, but a lot had changed since then. Her belly had swollen massively in a day, pushing out far further than it had previously, about seven inches off of her body. It was definitely noticeable now, even to the most oblivious of observers. Her green skin was stretched around it, feeling tight and having almost no give to it. The squirming had also gotten more frequent and felt much stronger and faster now than it had before. She put that down to her ever-increasing appetite, which had left her almost always craving some food. She sighed as she rubbed her belly, struggling to stand up off the bed.

Looking in the mirror only further showed her growth, as her breasts and butt had also started having little growth spurts. She grabbed a loose white t-shirt and pulled it over herself, and looked at herself dissatisfied in the mirror. The shirt draped over her breasts and covered them fairly well, but when it came to her belly, it was less successful. The shirt only covered to about her belly button, leaving just under half of her belly exposed and open.

She walked, although now it felt more like a waddle, out of her room to grab some breakfast. It had sort of become a routine for her over the past couple of days. Get up, have a look at herself, get dressed, eat, workout, etc. She stepped into the mess and grabbed a handful of food packets, and a bottle of water. She started chowing down on her food and was so engrossed in it that she didn't notice Mantis walk into the room, see her, and walk straight out again. Once Gamora was finished she walked back to her room to try and do some form of workout.

She sat in her room, trying to decide what sort of workout she could do. Sit-ups, push-ups or anything like that we're completely out of the question, given her belly, stopped her from doing most exercises. She resorted to trying squats, and stood up to start. She tried a few, finding that she had to shift around to adjust for her belly, but for the most part, found it easy exercise. Eventually, she stopped, finding herself out of breath and starting to sweat, giving her belly a slight shine to the tight surface. She decided to hop into the shower and clean herself up.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

After her shower, Gamora got dressed, putting on a larger shirt to try and cover more of her belly. As she finished up, she heard a ship landing outside, muffled chatter and the doors to the ship opening up. She walked outside to see Peter, Groot, Drax, Rocket, and who she assumed was the person they had broken out from the Kyln, all walking into the mess. She saw Peter point to an empty room and say something to the prisoner, who promptly left the others to their room. She walked into the mess, joining the others mid-conversation.

”Oh yas should have seen the look on his face! Ahh, it was priceless, ” Rocket said, recalling the job.

”It was glorious!” Added Drax

”Hey Gamo-” Peter said, before noticing her swollen stomach, looking very confused.

”Oh hey!” Said Rocket, turning to face her. ”Woah! Somebody's putting on weight!”

”I am not getting fat! It's just bloating!” Gamora replied angrily.

”Yeah sure, ” he said. ”what do you all think huh?”

”I am Groot” Groot said, slightly oblivious to Gamora’s feelings.

”You are looking much rounder” Drax said. ”puffier too, ”

Peter looked at her sympathetically. ”I think she looks fine,” he said, trying to emphasise the point to everyone else.

”Whatever, loverboy. What about you Mantis, you've been kinda quiet” Rocket said, looking slightly annoyed at Peter.

”I, I need to go to sleep! Goodnight!” Mantis said quickly, running anxiously to her room.

Gamora felt bad, thanks to everyone else comments, and walked briskly to her room, tears welling in her eyes. Peter looked at the others disdainfully.
1153121111111111111.title: Continue

11531211111111111111.content:
Gamora shut the door behind her and sat down heavily on her bed, trying her best to calm herself down. Rocket was really starting to get on her nerves nowadays. He'd always been a little annoying, but now it was ramped up to overdrive. Why was he acting like this?

After a few moments to herself, there was a knock at her door. Gamora quickly got underneath the covers as the door opened. Peter came in, a sympathetic look in his eyes. He approached her and sat down next to her on the bed.

"Hey," he said.

"Hi."

"I told off Rocket for you. I know that he's really been acting like a dick lately, and you know how Drax usually is. I'm sorry you had to put up with that," Quill stated.

Gamora smiled weakly. "Thank you, but I can take care of myself. You know that."

"Yeah. But someone's gotta have your back, right?" he smiled back.

The two looked each other in the eyes for a few moments, until Gamora looked away.

"Be real with me, Gamora. Are you alright? You seem really distant lately. Like there's something wrong," Peter noticed.

Gamora sighed, then shook her head. "Peter, I'm okay. I promise."

"Alright. I'll see you in the morning, then," he said.

Peter stood up and kissed Gamora on the top of her head, causing her to blush. He left the room, leaving her to herself. Though she didn't do much today, she was exhausted, and went to sleep minutes later.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gamora stood in front of her mirror the next morning, her jaw dropped. Her stomach had grown a few inches overnight yet again. Her belly button was no completely flat, threatening to pop out if she got any bigger.

She placed a cautious hand on the taut surface, feeling the squirms underneath.

"What is this?" she asked under her breath.

Gamora thought back to the night she spent with Quill over a week ago. She was pretty certain that he didn't use protection, and she definitely didn't.

Could she be pregnant? She certainly looked the part. But there was no way that she could be this big so quickly, right? Unless there was something seriously wrong. She looked like she could give birth any second now.

Her thoughts, racing a million miles an hour, were interrupted by a knock at the door.

"Hey, Gamora! You alright? We haven't seen you all morning. Can I come in?" Peter asked on the other side.

"What? No, that's okay. Just...thinking about some things. I'll be out in just a second," Gamora said.

She heard Peter walk away, and she sighed as she sat down on the bed. Gamora remembered what Mantis said a few days ago when they bumped into each other. The comment about the other lives. What could she possibly mean?

Maybe she should find out.
11531211111111111111.title: Peter tries to console her

choices: she hears a knock at the door (RESERVED)
115312111111111111111.content:
Gamora threw on a t-shirt that just very covered her belly and opened her door. She peeked outside briefly and seeing that the coast was clear she bolted towards Mantis’ room. She saw Mantis step out of the room, waving at Gamora.

”Good morni-” she started, being interrupted by Gamora pushing her back into her room and shutting the door.

”What did you mean ’other lives’” Gamora demanded. ”When we bumped into each other a few days ago”

”I-I do not know what you mean?” Mantis replied, trying to sound confused.

Gamora gave her a look, one that told her that she was not screwing around.

”When I was helping you up I put a hand on your stomach to steady you, ” Mantis said, looking down at her feet. ”When I did I felt life. Not just yours but more, ”

”So, I'm pregnant, ” Gamora replied, confused.

Mantis nodded. ”That is why I stopped talking to you and the others about you, ”

”That's fine now, ” Gamora said, pulling Mantis into a hug. ”Wait, you said ’lives’, as in there's more than one, ”

”I felt more than one, yes, but I did not see exactly how many there are. I could check for you now if you would let me?” she said gingerly.

Gamora nodded at her and sat down on the bed. She pulled up her shirt to reveal the taut green sphere that was her belly. Mantis crouched down next to her and began rubbing her belly, her antennae starting to glow.

”I feel- two here, ” she whispered, concentrating on finding the babies.

”Two. That's not so bad, ” Gamora said to herself. Twins were manageable, and she began planning in her head what to do.

”Three now, no wait five” Mantis said, sounding more concerned.

Five! That was a shock. Gamora was now struggling to plan ahead for five, her mind beginning to panic.

”six, seven, eight, nine! There are so many!” Mantis said, now sounding very anxious and worried for gamora.

Gamora’s head was starting to spin. Nine kids. In one go. They were definitely going to have their hands full. She was starting to sweat slightly but tried to stop herself form outwardly panicking, trying to stop Mantis from having a breakdown. ”Calm down, Mantis, ” she cooed, stroking Mantis’ head gently.

”Twelve! I-I count twelve total!” Mantis called out, her voice riddled with panic.

”Hey, don't panic! I'm going to be fine, this will all be fine, ” Gamora said to Mantis, bringing her into another hug, trying to keep her calm, despite her own mind not being much better.

Mantis leant into Gamora, embracing her hug and holding on. She took a few moments to calm herself down, eventually sitting next to Gamora. She placed her hands tentatively on her belly, and gently rubbed it in little circles.

”How did this happen. I mean, twelve babies!” Gamora said, calming down a little as her belly was rubbed.

”Maybe it has something to do with Peters parentage. He is the father, yes?” Mantis asked.

”Yes, he is, but he doesn't know yet. What do you mean?” Gamora replied, the thought of telling Peter getting pushed to the back of her mind.

”His father was Ego, so maybe during your bonding his Celestial DNA reacted with your body, giving you twelve children, ” Mantis stated thoughtfully.

Gamora thought for a minute. ”Maybe the modifications made to my body, like a healing factor, is what it mixed with. That might explain the fast growth, ”

”Yes, that makes sense, ” Mantis added. ”At the rate that they have grown since you and Peter-” Gamora coughed ”- I think you have only a few weeks left, ”

Gamora said nothing but looked down at her belly. She rubbed it as she felt a few squirms, trying to soothe the babies inside. A few weeks. That was all the time she had. She had to think about what to do when to tell the others, how they would manage it all. She looked at Mantis.

”Mantis, I need you to promise not to tell anyone about this. Please, ” she asked, looking Mantis in the eyes.

”I will try my best!” Mantis replied, smiling a little, trying to lighten the mood.

”Thank you, ” Gamora said. ”I don't know when I'll be able to tell the others, ”

She stayed with Mantis a little longer, the two of them sat on the bed rubbing her belly. Eventually, Gamora heaved herself off the bed, Mantis helping her to stand up. She said a quick goodbye and thank you to Mantis, before waddling towards the mess. She looked around, trying to pick out anyone sat in the room. She saw that the others were all sat in their seats in the cockpit, listening to some of Quill's music. Quickly she opened up one of the containers and grabbed a bundle of food packets, using the music to mask her sounds. She walked back to her room and shut the door, beginning to eat her breakfast.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

After spending the previous day in her room, thankful that Mantis told the others that she wasn't feeling great and that she had brought her food throughout the day, Gamora opened her eyes slowly. She slowly sat up and looked down at her belly.

She gasped quietly. Overnight her belly had grown out again, adding another inch or two to its size. She placed her hands on it hesitantly and massaged the tightly pulled skin. She could feel more kicks and squirms now and watched as they made little bumps on her belly. She sat there, rubbing her now larger belly.
115312111111111111111.title: Gamora decides to visit Mantis

1153121111111111111111.content:
A sudden knock at the door caused her to throw her covers over herself, trying to cover up her belly. Mantis walked in, holding a tray of food, smiling at her.

“I brought you some breakfast, ” she said, setting the tray down next to Gamora and shutting the door. ”Are you alright today?”

”Thanks. Yes, I'm fine, just a little bigger is all, ” Gamora replied, digging into the food quickly.

”That is good, ” Mantis said, watching her eat.

”Mantis, you wouldn't mind checking on the babies would you? Just look at how they are doing?” Gamora asked, finishing off a food packet.

”Of course! That is fine, ” Mantis said, moving her way towards Gamora’s bulging belly.

She placed her hands on it and began rubbing it gently, her antennae giving off a soft glow. Her hands explored the belly, rubbing all over the tight skin, occasionally poling a spot where a kick or wave could be seen.

”They are good!” she said, enthusiastically. ”They are growing nice and big, ”

Gamora smiled, satisfied knowing that her babies were doing well. She rubbed her belly a little as well, trying to soothe a few kicks.

”They are very active, but that is good. It shows that they are strong, ” Mantis continued, continuing to rub Gamora’s belly.

”Thank you Mantis, ” Gamora said. ”For helping me with this, ”

”You are welcome” Mantis replied, smiling goofily.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A while later Gamora was sat alone in her room, her shirt pulled up over her belly, leaving the whole enormous bump open. She was rubbing it affectionately, her hands massaging and exploring the surface. She enjoyed watching the little kicks and movements from inside her, pushing her belly around in different shapes. She would pat the kicks, and receive another kick as if it was a response to her.

All of a sudden she heard her door opening, noticing it too late to cover or hide her belly. She watched as Peter walked in, looking at her.

”I just wanted to see-” he stopped when he noticed her belly, kicks and all. ”W-what is that?”

Gamora was quiet for a while. ”Its... I-I'm” she struggled to find her words. ”I'm pregnant, ”

Peter stared at her for a minute, his face expressing looks of confusion. ”B-but when did it h-happen? You don't get that big q-quickly” he stammered, trying to work out how it had happened.

”a week or so ago. When we-” Gamora said, starting to choke up. ”I didn't want you to find out like this”

”So I-I'm the father? How does that work?” he exclaimed, his face looking even more confused and concerned.

”Y-Yeah, it's kind of complicated” she replied, her voice wavering slightly.

”T-this can't be happening. It's just not possible!” he said, trying to comprehend the situation. ”I- this is too much. I-I have to go, ”

”Peter wait! Please!” she called to him, tears beginning to drop from her eyes.

”I’m sorry, ” he whispered, shutting the door on her, leaving her alone.

She lay back on her bed, tears falling from her eyes. She brought a hand up to her face and wiped a few of the tears away, only for more to replace them. Her hands rested on her belly as she sobbed away, a few kicks disturbing the surface. She rubbed a few little circles to try and calm herself down and relax. She started to drift to sleep, tears still falling from her eyes as her hands caressed her belly.
1153121111111111111111.title: she hears a knock at the door

choices: On to the next phase of the job (RESERVED)
11531211111111111111111.content:
The following morning, Gamora found herself waddling through the halls of the Benatar. She was bigger than she was the previous day, that was for certain. But she realized that carrying twelve meant that this would happen, especially if the pregnancy would only last a month as Mantis predicted.

Gamora made her way to Peter's room, and she was surprised to find that it was empty. She looked around the pigsty, glancing at the posters adorning the walls. She saw a baseball mitt lying on the floor, and eventually came across his pair of headphones attached to the cassette player.

There was a tape already in it, and she picked it up as she sat down on Quill's bed. Gamora pressed play, and put the headphones near her ears as she heard the music play.

"Ooh, child. Things are gonna get easier. Ooh, child. Things will be brighter."

Gamora listened for a few more seconds, then lowered the headphones. Carefully, she place them on her belly, letting the babies listen to the music. They kicked gently.

She heard footsteps, and turned around to find Peter standing in the doorway. He swallowed and stepped inside.

"Hey," he said.

Gamora didn't reply. Quill frowned and sat next to her on the bed.

"I shouldn't have acted that way yesterday. I was just...just so confused about what was happening. And I guess that maybe I'm afraid of being a father. I never had a good father figure in my life. How am I supposed to be one?" he asked.

"I don't know. But we can figure it out together," she replied, kissing him on the cheek.

"So the baby likes the music?" Peter wondered.

Gamora sighed. "Yeah. But it's...it's more than one."

"Wow, really? How many?"

Gamora looked away. "Uh...maybe it'll be best if I told you later."

Quill nodded. "You should probably tell the others, right?"

"Well, Mantis already knows. But you're right. I don't think it'd be a good idea to hide it any longer," she replied.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gamora decided to tell Groot first. He was a little confused at first, but their brief conversation ultimately ended with him rubbing and hugging her belly.

Next, she went to Drax's room. She found him sharpening his weapons.

"Hi, Drax," she said, a little unsure of where this was going to go.

He turned around. "Ah. Hello, Gamora."

"Listen, I wanted to tell you something. Important. It's about me and Peter."

Drax shrugged. "I'm listening."

"I'm pregnant."

"Oh. Congratulations!" he smiled.

Gamora raised an eyebrow. "Really? You're not going to gloat?"

"No. Why would I do that? The journey that you and Quill are about to embark on, you especially, is one of the most honorable ones a person can take. If you ever need any assistance or advice, I'd be happy to give it to you," Drax said.

"Okay. Thanks," Gamora said, turning to leave.

"That did not go the way I thought it would," she muttered under her breath.

In the cockpit, Gamora found Rocket. He looked at her and cackled.

"Geez! You're not even gonna try to get rid of that gut?" he asked.

"Rocket, there's not really anything I can do about it. Quill and I are...we're having..." she started.

"Wait? You're pregnant?!?" Rocket asked.

Gamora nodded. "Yeah...yeah."

Rocket laughed and jumped from his seat. "You shoulda said something! I would have gone easy on you!"

As he passed, he patted Gamora's large belly, which gurgled in response.

"Great. This is gonna be a fun few weeks..." she groaned.
11531211111111111111111.title: The next morning

115312111111111111111111.content:
Gamora woke up slowly, feeling more relaxed than she had previously. Now that she had been open about what was happening, and now that everyone knew about it, she felt much better about things.

She sat up slowly and opened her eyes, looking down at herself. Her belly had clearly grown overnight, although she had anticipated some growth. She pulled off he blanket and rubbed her belly, massaging the tight green skin. Her shirt had been pushed up over her bump, covering only her breasts, which had also grown as well, tightening her shirt.

Leaning off of her bed she stood up, thrown off of her balance by her belly. She steadied herself against the wall and waddled towards her wardrobe, pulling out a large t-shirt. She looked in the mirror and sighed at the half of her belly that was left uncovered by her shirt. A part of her wished that it would slow down, and that she could savour it a little more. And not having to deal with rapid growth overnight would be a bonus to that as well. Pulling on a pair of loose pants, she waddled out towards the mess.

“Remind me why we have to put these stupid locks on everything?” Rocket grumbled.

“Its so the babies don’t die from whatever is in these” Quill responded, sounding slightly exasperated with Rocket.

Gamora walked in, seeing Drax and quill starting to baby-proof the room, while rocket sat behind them, unpacking boxes with the stuff they needed.

“Morning” she yawned, sitting at the table, near to Quill.

“Morning ‘Mora” Quill replied, smiling at her, placing a hand on her belly.

She placed her hand on his and smiled back at him, glad that he was with her again.

“Bleaugh!” Interrupted Rocket, joking around. “Come on, people are watchin”

Gamora shot him a quick look, trying to frown, but a small smirk broke through her façade.

“Could you just grab me some food, Peter?” She asked, putting on her best begging face. “Please?”

Peter got up, and brought over an armful of food packets, dropping them infront of Gamora, who smiled thankingly and dug in. She wolfed down a few packets, before noticing everyone ,save Drax, staring at her, looking slightly shocked.

“Wha.?” She exclaimed, her mouth full of food.

“You just ate, like, ridiculously fast. Like insanely fast” Peter spoke, slightly confused.

“So?” She replied, a few crumbs spilling out of her mouth.

“Nothing, just don’t choke?” Peter said. He shared a look with Rocket as she started digging in again.

After quickly finishing her meal, and feeling relatively satisfied, Gamora turned around and watched the others, glad that they were helping along with preparing.

”No not like that!”

Of course, that didn't mean it was going to be easy.

”what do you mean? That's what the instructions say!” Rocket said, indignantly.

”no, it isn't! This part goes here!” Quill said, pointing to the small scrap of paper.

”Oh come on, it's just a small shortcut, what's the worst that could happen?”

Quill held up the lock and tapped it gently, popping it into several pieces. ”that, ” he said, throwing the pieces back to Rocket.

”stop your arguing, you're putting me off” Drax added, attaching one of the locks to a cupboard.

”Where’s Mantis?” Gamora mouthed to Quill, getting more than a little irritated with their bickering.

”With groot, ” he mouthed back, before throwing another lock at Rocket.

Gamora pointed to Groots room and mouthed ”ill be in there”, heaving herself up and waddling to find Groot and Mantis.

Gently pushing open the door to Groot’s room, she saw Mantis with Groot sat on her lap, reading to him. Smiling a little, she shut the door to block out the sound of the others and went to sit by Mantis.

”Hello Gamora, how are you?” Mantis stopped reading, smiling at Gamora.

Groot followed suit, grinning at her. ”I am groot?”

”Im okay, and the babies are fine Groot” she replied, picking Groot up and softly resting him on her belly.

”I am groot?” he asked curiously, pointing at her belly.

”of course you can, you can feel them here” Gamora said, guiding him to the side of her belly where she had felt a kick or two.

Groot looked up at her with a look of amazement as he felt one of the babies kick, pushing him back slightly. He went back and poked at her belly, trying to get another response.

Gamora smiled at him, a feeling of joy rushing over her as groot curiosly investigated her belly.

”You will be a very good mother,” Mantis said, putting her hand on Gamoras shoulder, the same feeling washing over her.

”You really think so?” Gamora replied, sounding a little nervous.

”Of course! You are very good with Groot, and he is a child. He is good practice, ” Mantis said, placing her other hand on Gamora’s belly. ”your babies are very healthy”

Gamora said nothing, but leant against Mantis, a silent thanks for reassuring her.

A loud crash, followed by ”For god's sake that's idiotic!” shattered the moment. Gamora sighed, picking up Groot and heading out to see what had happened.
115312111111111111111111.title: On to the next phase of the job

1153121111111111111111111.content:
Gamora waddled out to the mess to find Peter sat in a chair, with an exasperated look on his face, Rocket sat on the other side of the room, muttering to himself, and Drax trying to carry on without them, seemingly successfully.

”What happened?” Gamora demanded, putting on her best mean face.

”Rocket said we should just electrify the handles, ” Peter explained, sounding annoyed.

”Not a big shock, just a little zap, to discourage the little tykes” Rocket quipped back, sounding equally annoyed.

”But they're babies, that could kill them dipshit!” Peter yelled back at him, throwing something towards him.

”Fine, fine maybe it was a little far” Rocket said, narrowly avoiding the object launched at him. ”But it would be so much quicker than this”

”Both of you be quiet!” Gamora chastised, raising her voice to grab their attention. ”Rocket it's a stupid idea. Peter, don't throw things at him, you aren't a child”

”Fine” the two said together.

”Why can't the two of you just work together, I'm sure Drax would appreciate some help” She added.

”Actually I work much faster without those two. They do not know what they are doing” Drax said, to the annoyance of both Peter and Rocket.

”Well if that's the case, I'm gonna go. I have some important stuff needs doing” Rocket said, walking to his room.

Gamora sighed and put Groot down on the floor, and sat down at the table, feeling a little tired. She rested her hands on top of her belly and watched as Groot started playing with Peter. She smiled at the two, seeing Peter with Groot giving her hope for their own children.

”Groot, go find Mantis, I'm sure she'll be happy to play with you” He told Groot quietly. ”i need to finish this up, then we can play”

Groot ran out of the room in search of Mantis, his feet carrying him as fast as he could go. Peter turned to Drax and the two began to carry on with their work, making good progress. Eventually, Drax left to go to the bathroom, leaving Peter and Gamora alone together.

”Need any help, Peter?” Gamora asked, rubbing her belly.

”Sure, just hand me the pieces from over there and I'll put them together” He replied, gesturing to the jumbled mix of parts.

Gamora walked over to him and started handing him parts as she sat down, trying to sift through the pile and find the right components. The two worked quietly for a while until Peter pulled out his ’Zune’ or whatever it was and handed an earbud to Gamora. She put it in her ear and heard some of Peters music start to play, starting to recognise the lyrics.

The sailors say: "Brandy, you're a fine girl" (you're a fine girl)

She leaned her head against Peters shoulder, the two of them slowly working away.

"What a good wife you would be" (such a fine girl)

She placed a hand on her belly and felt a few kicks, and Peter putting his hand on her belly, trying to feel the kicks.

"Yeah, your eyes could steal a sailor from the sea"

Gamora looked at Peter, finding him looking back at her. The two shared a kiss as they worked.

----------

Gamora was waddling back to her room for a quick rest after helping Peter with babyproofing. She trusted that he and Drax could get the job done, with minimal incidents.

”Ah, Gamora, I was lookin for yas” she heard Rocket say from behind her.

”What is it?” She replied, a little grumpily.

”I just wanted to apologize. For being such a dick to ya. I made you this” He said, holding up a round device, with a small screen on it.

”Thanks, what is it?” She asked, taking the device from him and inspecting it.

”Its a portable ultrasound. Figured you'd want to have a look at your kids at some point” he said, turning to leave.

Gamora picked him up in a tight hug. ”thank you Rocket. Really, thank you so much” she said, feeling a few tears start to brim in her eyes.

”Ah, your welcome. Now can ya put me down!” Rocket joked, smiling.

Gamora put him down and thanked him once more, before entering her bedroom. She sat down on her bed, and pulled up her shirt. She looked at the device in her hand and switched it on. It hummed to life and a small display popped up on the screen. She placed the device on her belly, and saw an image of her womb on the screen. She could make out a couple of shapes as babies, and moved it around, trying to find more. She saw them moving and kicking and could feel small tears of joy running down her face.

After a few minutes of playing with the device, Gamora set it aside, satisfied with it for the moment. She lay down on her bed, resting her hands on her belly and began to drift off to sleep.

----------

A gentle knock at her door woke Gamora up. She slowly opened her eyes and saw Peter walk in and sit next to her.

”just wanted to check up on you and tell you we’re approaching Contraxia” he said softly.

”mmh okay” Gamora grumbled, still half asleep.

”Rocket told me about his gift. I take it you enjoyed it?”

”it was wonderful” she said. ”you should try it with me”

”I will, when we finish up on Contraxia.” he patted her belly and kissed her forehead. ”ill be in the bridge, okay?”

Gamora nodded and rolled over, starting to drift off again.
1153121111111111111111111.title: Baby-proofing continues

11531211111111111111111111.content:
Gamora was woken up again by a knock at the door. Quill entered once more.

"Hey, we're here. You said you wanted to come with us, right?" he asked.

"Mmm, yeah," she said, nodding. "I've been cooped up on this ship for too long."

Gamora slowly threw the blankets to the other side of the bed. Peter's eyes bulged when he saw that her belly had gotten bigger overnight.

"You...you look bigger than you did a few hours ago..."

"There's a reason for that. I'll tell you why once we get back on the ship..." Gamora grunted, trying to get up.

Peter noticed her struggling and helped her up, using more strength than he had anticipated. Once Gamora was upright, Quill rubbed her belly, and their quickly growing children kicked and moved in response.

"Oof!" Gamora grunted as she felt a particularly strong kick. "I think they like you. More than they like me."

"Oh, come on. Don't be so hard on yourself," Peter smiled, leading her out of her bedroom.

"I've got this for you. It's cold out there, so I thought you'd need it," he offered, handing her a large fur coat.

Gamora grabbed it and put it on. Somehow, it was able to cover her massive stomach. "Thanks, Peter!" she said, giving him a peck on the cheek.

~~~~~~~~~

The Guardians were greeted by a wave of cold wind and snow as they stepped off the ship and onto the surface of the neon-coated outpost on Contraxia.

"Okay, our contact should be meeting us in ten minutes. Gamora, Mantis, would you two keep Groot occupied? He's been a little rambunctious today," Rocket said.

Rocket, Drax, and Quill lead the prisoner to the middle of the outpost, leaving Gamora and Mantis at the foot of the ship alone with Groot.

Mantis looked at Gamora and smiled. "You can go and relax, Gamora. I can take care of him."

"Really? I appreciate it!" Gamora replied, finding herself trying not to cry.

Gamora went her own way, exploring the outpost, while Mantis chased after Groot.

Minutes later, Gamora found herself on an empty balcony outside of a building overlooking the center of the station. She slowly waddled to the railing, hands on her back, and watched as the guys negotiated with their contact. It seemed to be going well.

"Gamora?" a voice called out. It was familiar.

She turned, and saw just about the last person she was expecting to find here.

"Nebula?"

"What are you doing here?" Nebula asked, approaching her.

"We...we're doing a job. Why are you here?" Gamora wondered.

Nebula sighed. "I'm supposed to meet someone. I'm hoping they can help us find our loving father."

They looked at the outpost in silence for a few moments. "I'm going to kill him, Gamora. I had...a dream. At last I think it was. He's going to destroy everything," Nebula said.

Gamora nodded. "I saw the same thing. Just be careful, okay? You know, it's rare that we run into each other without fighting until we're both almost dead."

"Yeah. It's...pretty nice...I guess. I should go. The longer I wait here, the more time Thanos has to prepare," Nebula said, turning away.

"Wait!" Gamora said as she grabbed her sister's arm.

"What?" she asked, an eye going wide.

Gamora took a deep breath. "I have something to show you."

She opened her coat, exposing her enormous belly to the cold.

Nebula's jaw dropped. "Gamora are you--you're pregnant?!?"

Gamora nodded. Nebula approached her sister and placed a hand on the rounded surface. She gasped when she felt kick and squirms push against her palm.

"Wait. Are they Quill's?"

Gamora sighed. "Uh...yeah. They are."

Nebula got up. "Well, at least they'll have you as their mother."

The sister's hugged, and Gamora wished Nebula luck on her journey. Gamora headed to the ship, where the rest of the Guardians were waiting.

Peter wrapped his arm around her as they went inside of the Benatar. He noticed that she seemed somewhat sad.

"You alright?" he asked.

"Yeah. Just thinking about some loved ones."
11531211111111111111111111.title: Arrival on Contraxia

115312111111111111111111111.content:
The two of them walked back into the ship, heading towards the mess. Gamora took off her heavy cloak, setting it down on a chair and sitting down slowly. She put her hands on her belly, feeling her children kicking.

“I’m just going to go set our course with Rocket, be right back” Peter said, placing a load of food in front of her.

Gamora started eating, working her way through the packets quickly. She opened a packet, tearing it open, dropping food onto her belly. Going to pick it up, she watched as one of the babies kicked, rolling the food across her belly. She smirked as another kick flung a bit of food off her belly onto the floor. She finished off the packet and dug into another, using her belly as a shelf to hold her food.

She heard giggling. ”Thats clever” Peter quipped, walking towards her.

”This belly is handy for some things” She replied, giving her bump a pat.

The two of them played around with the babies for a while, watching them kick food off of their mommas belly, and even trying to get a kick to land a piece of food in her mouth, with some success.

”Do you want to go have a look with the ultrasound? See your kids for the first time?” Gamora asked, catching a rogue piece of food.

”Yeah, why not” Peter replied, stammering slightly.

As Peter stood up, Gamora raised her arm, struggling to stand. He pulled her up, wheezing quietly after. The two made their way to her room, closing the door behind them. Gamora lay back on the bed, holding the device in her hand and switching it on.

”Are you ready?” She asked, handing the device to Peter.

”As I'll ever be” he replied, grabbing the device in his hand.

He hesitated for a second before placing it on her belly, the display lighting up with the image inside her womb. He stared at it as he moved it around, in awe of her. She looked at him and smiled, feeling her eyes start to water a little.

”This is... Amazing” Peter said, still in awe.

”Yeah, yeah it is” Gamora replied, sniffling a little.

”How many are there?” Peter asked, more to himself than Gamora. He moved the device around, counting under his breath. ”there are 12. 12 babies”

”if it helps I was just as shocked” Gamora added, laughing a little.

”Yeah, we are definitely gonna have our work cut out aren't we” Peter replied, laughing with her.

The two stayed like that for a while longer, both feeling immensely happy, watching their children move and kick and squirm in real time. Eventually they left the device to the side, rubbing her belly slowly, together.

”could you just give me a back massage? Please?” Gamora asked, quietly. ”Carrying this belly is hard work.”

”Of course I can” Peter said, sitting up, Gamora following suit.

She sat with her back to him and he began massaging, slowly easing up her muscles. She let out the occasional satisfied moan as she could feel her back getting less and less tense. She shut her eyes and let Peter continue, beginning to feel sleepy. She lay down on her side, and felt Peter lay behind her. She felt him reach his arm over her, resting it on her belly, and she put her hand next to his as they both drifted off to sleep.

----------

Gamora woke up to the feeling of movement in her belly. A lot more than she had previously felt. Sitting up, she pulled the covers away to reveal her massive belly, the overnight growths now getting bigger and bigger. She had stopped wearing shirts as she slept, as they started to feel hotter and hotter the larger she grew. Her hands explored her tight green skin, massaging and soothing the babies inside.

”Come on now, stop kicking” she whispered to her belly.

She remembered that most of the others had left earlier on a quick supply run to a station, to stock up for the imminent birth of the babies, and for the next part of the job. Slightly annoyed that she didn't have anyone to help her stand up, she heaved herself out of bed, taking a couple of tries to do so.

She grabbed a t-shirt from her wardrobe and started to put it on. She pulled it down over her chest and tried to go further, but had no such luck. The shirt looked like a crop too that was far too small for her, just covering her enlarged breasts, but still showing off a lot of cleavage. Sighing in resignation she grabbed a pair of pants, sitting down to put them on. She started to struggle when she reached her thighs, having to pull and pull to get them up she struggled more to get them over her butt, which had grown much larger over the course of her pregnancy.

Eventually, she managed to get them on, but they felt incredibly tight. She grabbed another shirt, that was much stretchier than the previous and pulled it over herself. This time she barely managed to cover her belly button, and she knew that throughout the day it would begin to ride up her bump.

She walked over to the mirror to look at herself. ”Eh, this will do I guess” she said to herself, grumpily.

As she turned around she heard a loud rip, and saw in the mirror that her pants had torn at the seams, baring her thighs in the open. She lost it. She collapsed onto her bed in tears, annoyed that her clothes no longer fit, that she had nothing to wear. She was annoyed that every part of her was seemingly bigger, her butt, her boobs, and especially her belly. She wiped the tears from her eyes, only for another load to start coming.

”I am Groot?” she heard a quiet voice from the doorway. Groot was stood with a sad look on his face.

”Oh, hey Groot” she said, trying to stop crying. ”Im okay, just a bit emotional”

Groot walked towards her bed and climbed up sitting in front of her. ”I am Groot?”

”Don't worry, you won't understand. It's a pregnancy thing” Gamora said, trying to smile for him.

Groot nervously held out his hand, and slowly a little flower started to grow, blossoming in front of Gamoras face.

Gamora picked it and began to cry again, but now they were tears of joy. ”Thank you Groot” she sniffled, pulling him into a hug

”I am Groot” he replied gladly, grabbing the flower and placing it behind her ear.

Gamora smiled at him and hugged him once more.
115312111111111111111111111.title: Week 4 begins

1153121111111111111111111111.content:
Gamora heard loud thuds and footsteps. That must be the others. She scooped up Groot and carried him, using her huge belly for support, and waddled towards the ramp.

Gamora saw the other Guardians hauling cribs, toys, and more up the ramp. Rocket, meanwhile, dragged a crate with dozens of weapons for the mission.

"You all stopped to get things for the babies?" she asked, tears building up in her eyes.

"Well..." Peter began, kissing Gamora's cheek, "it was about half for the babies, and half for the job."

"We also got some larger clothes for you. It seems like you're running out of things to wear," Mantis noticed, gesturing towards the fact that Gamora was only wearing an ill-fitting shirt and underwear.

"Yeah. I think I ripped the last pair of pants that would even come close to fitting. Thanks, Mantis!" Gamora said, setting Groot down, who ran after Rocket.

Mantis shook her head. "Actually, it was Drax's idea."

Gamora raised an eyebrow. "Really?"

"When Hovat was carrying Kamaria, she quickly outgrew her clothes. I noticed that you were growing rapidly, so I thought it would be a good idea," Drax said.

"Oh...well, thank you!" Gamora said, hugging Drax, her massive belly colliding into him. He awkwardly patted him on the back.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

After a few hours, Gamora and Quill had finished setting up the cribs in the room where they had previously held the prisoner. Gamora stood in front of one of the cribs, holding onto it for support.

Peter approached her from behind and rubbed the sides of her stomach. She placed her hands on his, and together they sat in silence as they felt their babies move.

"I can't believe how fast this has gone by. They're almost here! All...twelve of them..." Peter trailed off.

Gamora smirked. "You're telling me! How do you think it feels to carry them?"

Peter chuckled. "Yeah. I know that you've got super strength and all that. But still, that's a lot. I'm worried that it might be too much for you. You're not gonna...explode are you? It's just that it would take a long time to clean all that up."

Gamora jabbed him with her elbow and slowly turned around. "Well, since you're worried, I'll try my best to stay in one piece," she laughed.

Peter leaned his head forward and placed it on hers. "Are you ready for this?"

"I...I think so. At least I have the best team you could ask for behind me to help," she replied.

"Damn right!" Peter said excitedly. He poked Gamora's belly playfully.

Gamora placed a hand over it as it gurgled and groaned. The babies began to kick and roll. "Ooh...Maybe don't do that...I think I have to go to the bathroom again," she sighed

She plodded out of the room. "Wait! You just went two minutes ago!" Peter yelled after her.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

As Gamora exited the bathroom, she was stopped by Drax.

"Ah! Gamora! Just who I was looking for."

Gamora stopped. "Where you waiting outside of the bathroom for me?"

Drax tensed up. "What? Oh, of course not! I was just...looking at the wall!"

"You're a bad liar. What is it?"

Drax reached into his pants pocket and pulled out a knife. "I wanted to give you this."

Gamora took it and rotated it in her hand. "Alright. Thank...you?"

"It belonged to Kamaria. I gave it to her when I took her for her first hunt. When your children are born, I'd like you to give it to the child that you prefer the most," he explained.

"I don't think I'll have a favorite child, Drax."

Drax smiled. "You will. Trust me."
1153121111111111111111111111.title: The others return (RESERVED)

11531211111111111111111111111.content:
Gamora woke up the next morning, hearing muffled talking from the mess. She assumed that the others had started planning for the assault on the convoy, and that she had woken up fairly late.

She opened her eyes and looked down at her belly. She had again grown overnight. But this time the growth had been huge, her belly now sticking out around three feet.She put her hands on the tight skin, feeling how taut and stretched it was. She noted that it was starting to lose some of its give.

She tried to sit up, but the weight of her belly held her down, and bearing down on her body. She moaned slightly as she tried again, the weight starting to get more and more uncomfortable for her.

“Maybe Rocket could make me something to take the weight off” she grumbled to herself, finally sat up.

She started the struggle to stand up, swinging herself slightly for momentum. She grabbed onto her dresser and pulled herself forward, throwing herself off the bed, onto her feet. Taking a moment to adjust her balance, she steadied herself against the wall.

She waddled towards the bathroom, her hands resting on her back, and started to run a shower. She stepped in, feeling the warm water run over her swollen body, easing some of the tension in her muscles. She rubbed in the soapy water, trying to spread it across her belly, but still missing a few spots around her bellybutton.

Gamora stepped out of the shower, drying herself off, draping a towel over her belly in an attempt to dry it. She stepped back into her room and had a look at the clothes that the others had bought for her. She pulled out a long black skirt and a grey t-shirt, deciding to wear them for the day.

She threw her towels to the side and grabbed a bra from the shopping. She started putting it on, but noticed that it felt tight around her, and saw that her breasts were bulging out of the top. Sighing, she started to pull on her panties, tugging them up her legs, struggling to get around her belly. She pulled them up and felt them digging into her hips slightly, accentuating her butt a little.

She grabbed the skirt and put it on, pulling it up her legs. She pulled it over her butt, and looked at it in the mirror. It wasn’t too tight and fit fairly well, but she knew that she wouldn’t be able to wear it for much longer. She grabbed the shirt and pulled it on, stretching it over her swollen form, managing to pull it over a fair portion of her belly. She made a mental note to thank Drax for getting extra stretchy clothes.

Feeling her stomach grumble, Gamora started to make her way to the mess to find some food. As she walked she felt the babies start to kick, and rubbed the spots to try and soothe them. The kicks kept going, and began to get more intense. She sat back down on the bed as the kicks started to hurt, not causing huge amounts of pain, but repeatedly kicking and squirming. She fell back trying to calm them down, to no avail.

“Hey, just coming to che-“ Peter started, walking in to her room. “Woah whats going on?” He said, running to her side.

“Babies kicking, hard!” Gamora groaned, rubbing her belly in futility.

Peter started to rub with her, trying to help as best he could. “Stop kicking your mama!” He said, trying to lift her spirits.

Gamora smiled a little, but soon went back to cringing in pain. She moaned in pain, and rubbed her belly with Peter, desperate for it to stop. “It feels like they want out!” She moaned.

“Gamora..?” Mantis walked in, looking anxious.

“Mantis! Come help” Peter called to her, ushering her over. “Try and stop the babies or something”

Mantis walked towards Gamora nervously, holding out her hand towards her squirming belly. Her gand made contact and her antenna began to glow as she rubbed her belly.

“Sleeep” she whispered, closing her eyes in concentration.

As soon as she spoke the squirming, and the pain subsided. Gamoras belly was still again, and she sat up, with a look of intense relief on her face. She looked at Peter and Mantis, who both seemed equally relieved that she was fine again.

“Thanks Mantis” she said, breathing heavily. “I think, you should probably stay close to me now. To stop that from happening again”

Mantis nodded in agreement, rubbing her belly again.

— — — -

Later that evening, the group was in the mess, talking, save for Gamora and Mantis.

“Nah im sure its possible, just might lose a limb or tw-“ Rocket said, stopping because of the others surprised looks.

He turned around to see Gamora walking in. Or Gamoras belly, followed by Gamora. Her bump was completely exposed, with nothing covering it, but that had come to be expected. What wasn’t was that the rest of her wasn’t covered either. Her legs were completely bare, her belly just covering her crotch from view, and her butt exposed. Her large breasts were also exposed, resting on her belly. As she sat down, they could see that she had a slightly embarassed look on her face, and that she was blushing slightly.

“What, did you lose ya clothes?” Rocket quipped, trying to joke around, and immidiately began to regret.

“Just shut up Rocket. You try being this f@*cking big and having any clothes that fit, or don’t tear. I’ve had it up to here with your sh*t if I’m honest, so just zip it” Gamora yelled, starting to get worked up.

Mantis stepped in and placed a hand on Gamoras shoulder. “Calm” she whispered, soothing Gamora.

Gamora breathed in and out slowly, calming down from her rage. She looked at The others, particularly Rocket, and saw them all with their mouths slightly agape. “Sorry, hormones” she said, and began to eat.

— — — -

After she had finished eating and had talked to the others for a bit, Gamora had retreated to her room for the night. Though she felt tired, she wanted to try something before bed. She rolled out a mat on the floor, and stood on it. She stretched for a minute or two and then began to attempt some stretches, to try and keep relatively fit

She stood up and then bent over to try and touch her toes, getting nowhere near because of her belly, but still stratching out. She repeated it a couple more times befor changing positions. This time she put her legs apart slightly and started to squat. She felt her belly hit the floor and rub against her legs a little, and grunted as she heaved herself up again. She tried a few mire before moving on.

After a few more stretches and positions, she settled herself into bed and drifted to sleep, rubbing her belly.
11531211111111111111111111111.title: Continue

115312111111111111111111111111.content:
Over the next few days, Gamora had spent most of the time in her room. When she wasn't there, she was in the babies' room, making sure they had everything they needed before she gave birth. She'd heard of the term "nesting" once or twice, and assumed that this was what she was experiencing.

Speaking of birth, she figured she had to be getting close. Gamora knew fairly little about pregnancy, but it certainly felt like the babies were getting ready to come out.

Gamora retrieved Peter's headphones and brought them back to her room. The babies were being particularly active, and she hoped some music would calm them down. She sat down heavily on the bed, it creaking in the process, and brought the headphones near her belly. This would be difficult. Her stomach was much wider than it was the last time she tried to do this.

Gamora pulled each ear pad down, extending them a little more. She hoped that it would do the trick. She tried to put it around the sides of her belly, but it stopped at the very top. Gamora tried to pull them further apart, forcing it down the sides of her monstrous stomach. It stopped again a few inches down, the headphones beginning to strain.

Gamora pushed them down again, and the headphones suddenly snapped in half. She held them in her hands and started to tear up.

Mantis stood by the doorway, coming when she heard her struggling earlier. "Are you alright?"

"I...I broke them..." Gamora cried.

Mantis approached her, patting her on the back. Gamora continued to cry. Mantis placed her hand on Gamora's head. "Calm..." she said.

Gamora stopped crying, her mood brightening. Gamora hugged Mantis, her belly pushing into the small woman. "You're gonna be around for the birth, right?"

Mantis smiled and nodded.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The next day, Gamora was sitting in her room munching on food. Lost in her own thoughts, she almost didn't see Drax come in.

"Gamora," he said.

"Hmm? Oh, hi Drax," she replied.

"Quill suggested that I talk to you. The babies will be here soon, correct?" Drax asked.

Gamora shifted. "Uh...I think so. I hope so."

"He thought that it'd be a good idea if I talked to you about what comes after. After the very painful birth, I mean," he added.

"Oh. Thanks. I guess it would help. I haven't read any parenting books. I don't really know what I'm doing when it comes to being a parent," she said, hands resting on her belly as her babies kicked.

Drax shook his head. "You don't need any books. They're pointless. All you have to do is what you feel is right. You'll do what's best for them."

Gamora smiled, and turned her head as Peter entered the room.

"We're gonna reach the convoy tomorrow morning. Rocket thought it would be a good idea if we had a big dinner tonight. Never know if it could be the last one we have together. That sound good?" he asked.

Before anyone could answer, Gamora's belly let out a huge rumble. There was silence for a moment.

"I take that as a yes," Peter said.
115312111111111111111111111111.title: The next day (RESERVED)

1153121111111111111111111111111.content:
Peter went to help Gamora up, pulling her up as best he could. Drax noticed him struggling and started to help, pulling her up with ease, leaving Peter with a slightly annoyed look on his face. Gamora simply smiled as she left the room

The three of them left the room, Drax and Peter trailing slightly behind the Gamora. They entered the mess and saw that Rocket, with help from Groot and Mantis, had set out a large meal on the table, with a lot of the food towards one end.

”Thank you, Rocket. This is amazing” Gamora said, feeling herself start to tear up.

”Ah, I thought I’d do something nice for ya, and before we go for the heist” Rocket replied, jumping down from a chair.

The group all sat down at the table, Gamora sitting down at the end of the table, to leave room for her belly. Quill sat next to her and patted her belly playfully.

”Dig in” Rocket said, grabbing some food.

Everyone began eating, slowly grabbing bits of food from the table. Gamora, on the other hand got into the food immediately, grabbing food from all over the table and quickly wolfing it down, grabbing more afterwards. The others had grown used to it throughout her pregnancy and paid little attention to her messy eating.

”So what's the plan for tomorrow?” Gamora asked between mouthfuls.

”We’re leaving early, and taking the pod to the rendezvous point, ” Peter started, recounting the plan. ”Then we wait for the convoy to arrive, ”

Rocket carried on. ”When it arrives, that's when the fun begins. We gotta attack it quick, take out the guards and get our loot fast. If we're quick enough we can do it before backup arrives. If not...” he stopped, trying to think of what to say.

”We shall fight our way out of it” Drax added, smiling at the thought of a good fight. ”We will be back in no time at all, we fight well. Well, I do”

”Hey! I'm a good fighter, I can hold my own in a fight” Quill replied in slight annoyance.

”Ehhh, you could do better Quill, ” Rocket said, smirking.

Peter looked around with a look of exasperation, as everyone else giggled and laughed, including Gamora. She patted his shoulder as he joined in laughing. The rest of the evening was spent telling stories and jokes, laughter echoing through the ship.

After the meal, everyone began to head back to their rooms, to get ready for the long day ahead of them, until the only two people left in the mess we're Gamora and Peter. She was leant against him, the two of them rubbing her large belly together.

They had Rockets device with them, and they were looking at the display on the screen, exploring her belly. They counted each baby, but still couldn't work out the gender of each, so they would have to wait till she gave birth to find out.

”I think you're coming to the end” Peter said, looking at the screen. ”The device says that they're fully developed”

”I think so too, it's getting pretty tight isn't it” Gamora added, patting her belly for emphasis.

”I can't wait to meet them” Peter said, kissing her on the cheek.

The two of them stayed like that for a while, until Gamora spoke up.

”I might head to bed now” she said, standing up slowly. ”Care to join me?” she added, winking at Peter.

Peter looked at her and smiled, following her to her bedroom and quickly undressing.

”This has building up all this time, so lets make it count” she said to him, enjoying his enthusiasm.

”Yeah, lets” he said, lying down on the bed next to her, ready to start.

She sat up and kneeled over him, her belly just touching his chest. It was in that moment that she realised how much harder it would be with her belly in the way. She straddled him and began to move up and down, but stopped when she heard Peter huff loudly.

”C-can’t b-breathe, ” he stuttered, Gamoras belly crushing him against the bed.

”Oh my- Peter I'm so sorry!” she said, trying as quickly as she could to get off him, letting him breathe again.

”try something else?” he asked, catching his breath again.

Gamora nodded, and lay back on the bed, letting Peter take charge this time. He stood between her legs and moved to start, but found that her belly got in the way, covering her crotch slightly, but just enough to stop him from reaching it. He sighed in resignation and looked at Gamora, who was giving him a look of ’something else?’.

They tried several more positions, but found each one awkward in their own way. Eventually they discovered a relatively comfortable position, and quickly got to work, giving Gamora a release that she had been crying for weeks. The two lay down in bed together, satisfied, and fell asleep rubbing her belly.
1153121111111111111111111111111.title: Continue (RESERVED)

11531211111111111111111111111111.content:
Gamora woke up feeling movement from inside her belly. She looked at her belly, which had only slightly grown overnight, an watched as the babies inside kicked around forming bumps and bulges all across the tight surface. She rubbed the bumps gently and looked around to see Peter getting dressed.

”Morning” she yawned, holding her belly.

”Morning, how'd you sleep?” He replied with a cheeky grin on his face.

She shot him a look and smirked back at him. ”Okay, babies didn't kick too much. How about you?”

”Pretty good, but I'm a little nervous about the Heist” He said, pulling his shirt on.

”I wish I could help you” Gamora said, sadly.

”I know, but we can't let you get hurt, and the babies are gonna arrive soon” Peter said, rubbing her belly. Gamora pouted, annoyed. ”I’ll be back before you know it, and maybe we can continue where we left off last night”

Gamora smirked and kissed him on the cheek. ”Maybe we could” she whispered back.

He put his jacket on and patted her belly, leaving to grab some breakfast. She sat up and rubbed her belly a little, noting that it felt tighter and that the babies were more active than usual, but not enough to cause her any pain. She heaved herself off the bed, taking a moment to catch her breath again. She waddled towards the mirror and had a look at herself. She rubbed her belly and noticed that it was hanging lower than it had previously and felt heavier than previously. She felt her stomach grumble, and began to make her way to the mess.

In the mess, she found the others all quickly eating some food and making the final preparations for the heist. Rocket was assembling some sort of gun, while Drax was sat next to Peter, both eating some food. Mantis was sat opposite them, playing with Groot a little before they left. Gamora sat down next to her and began eating her breakfast rapidly.

”Is everyone ready?” Rocket announced, having finished building his new weapon.

Peter and Drax both finished their meals and stood up, while Groot said a quick goodbye to Mantis and walking up to Drax.

”Good luck guys” Gamora said. ”come back in one piece”

Peter patted her belly gently. ”we will, i promise” he said.

The group left for the pod and buckled in, Groot sitting on Peters lap. They waved goodbye as the pod dropped down and soared off into the distance.

”its gonna be a long day, isn't it” Gamora said, rubbing her belly.

----------

A few hours had gone by, and Mantis and Gamora had received a short message from the others to say that they had arrived. They had spent most of the day together, tidying the babies room, and rubbing her belly to calm the babies. Gamora had felt a few sharp pains throughout the day but had put them down to the babies getting more and more active. She was sat on her bed rubbing her belly, with Mantis sat in front of her, rubbing her belly as well. She felt another pain and moaned slightly. The pain was followed by a strange sensation between her legs and what felt like fluid running between them.

”Gamora, did you wet yourself?” Mantis asked her naively.

”I-I don't think so. I think the babies are coming” she replied, slightly in shock.

The two women looked at each other and shared a look of panic. After a few seconds they sprung into action, Mantis running to grab supplies and Gamora clearing the bed to make room. She struggled as she felt a contraction, and her belly tightening. She soothed it and carried on. Mantis ran back in, carrying towels, and a medkit. She helped Gamora onto the bed, and started to rub her belly, trying to soothe the babies and slow them down a little.

”Get a message to Peter. Tell him to hurry up” Gamora said, beginning some breathing exercises.

”Of course! I will be as quick as i can!” Mantis replied, quickly running to the bridge to send the others a message.

Gamora rubbed her belly as she felt another contraction coming on. She hoped this would be easy, but part of her knew that it definitely wasn't.

----------

The others were sat in the pod, just outside the route that the convoy was taking. They were starting to get antsy, as the convoy still hadn't arrived, even though they were dead on time. Peter was slightly more anxious than the others.

”What if something goes wrong, what if they get hurt?” He said, pacing back and forth.

”They will be fine Quill, they are both capable fighters,” Drax said, trying to relax him.

”One of them is heavily pregnant, and Mantis? A fighter?” He returned, looking worried.

”Quill quit ya worrying. Trust me they'll be fine. If anything Gamora being pregnant makes her way harder to fight. I wouldn't wanna be on her bad side” Rocket added, remembering when Gamora had snapped at him.

”I am Groot!” Groot said, in an enthusiastic tone.

”I guess so, I just don't want her or the babies to get hu-” Peter was cut off by a beeping sound from one of the consoles.

”Convoys here, Let's move!” Rocket called, cocking his gun and smiling. ”this is gonna be good”

The four of them leapt out of the pod and began their assault, just missing a message from Mantis.

----------

”AAGGHH!” Gamora screamed, pushing as hard as she could.

”You are doing very good! Keep pushing!” Mantis encouraged, trying not to sound nervous. She rubbed Gamoras tightening belly and her antenna lit up, as she tried to ease her pain a well as she could.

”It hurts!” Gamora called back, through gritted teeth.

”You have already had one, only eleven more to go!” Mantis carried on, trying her best.

”Where are the others, where's Peter?” Gamora questioned, starting to push again.

Mantis gulped. ”I don't think they got the message” she stammered.

Gamora groaned as she pushed again, feeling the next baby come out, and Mantis cutting the cord. ”Why is this so hard!”

Mantis simply rubbed her belly slowly and closed her eyes, concentrating as hard as she could to ease her pain. Gamora could feel some of her pain seeping away and made a note to thank Mantis as much as she could after this was all over.

She bore down on another contraction and moaned in pain. Her belly was starting to glisten with sweat, but she saw that it had shrunk slightly. She pushed again and felt the third baby crowning. She screamed and pushed again, feeling immense relief as Mantis eased the baby out.

”only nine more!” Mantis smiled, as Gamora began to push again.

----------

”That was amazing! The look on their faces! Ah, Classic!” Rocket laughed, recalling the heist.

”It truly was glorious! And when their backup showed up! Ha!” Drax added.

Rocket pulled the pod into the docking bay, carefully parking it back were it belonged. The door opened and the four of them walked out, confused as to where Gamora and Mantis were.

”Gamora? We're back!” Peter yelled.

”Peter? I-In here!” he heard Gamora yell back, sounding pained.

He ran to her bedroom and burst through the door. He saw Gamora lying back on the bed, her belly significantly smaller and covered in sweat, and nine babies neatly wrapped up and sleeping on the floor. He immediately ran to her side and grabbed her hand.

”I am so so sorry I left! Why didn't you guys send a message?” He asked, sounding concerned.

”We did” Mantis said.

The realisation hit Peter immediately. ”Shit, I am so sorry Gamora. I-I should have paid attention to the console and i-” Peter started, getting cut off by Gamora.

”You’re here now, Peter.” she said, smiling weakly.

Peter kissed her forehead as she started to push once more, moaning in agony. He encouraged her and helped Mantis to guide the baby out. Another few pushes and they were down to one final baby.

”Come on Gamora, one left, you can do it!”

She pushed as hard as she could, and screamed again, feeling the baby start to crown. She pushed and pushed and eventually she felt the final baby come out. She smiled for a second as she drifted to sleep, exhausted from her labour.

Gamora woke up a few hours later. She slowly opened her eyes and saw that everyone was sat in the room, holding a baby or two. Peter walked over to her, cradling two of their babies and handed one to her.

”Well done mama” he said, smiling goofily. ”5 boys and 7 girls”

”Theyre perfect!” she replied, feeling tears start to water in her eyes.

”Next time, maybe we should use protection” Peter joked, getting a jab in the rins from Gamora.

She looked at the scene around her and smiled. It was perfect.

Tigra was not in the best of moods. She was stuck in her bed, not able to do any crime fighting or go on patrols. All she could do was stay in the mansion all day.

'Well', she thought, 'That's what happens when your pregnant with 16 lost souls.'

A while back, Doctor Strange had asked for her help. Apparently, 16 souls were lost trying to find their way to the after life. They were lost becuase Death, the one who was supposed to claim them, dissapeared. Strange needed to keep the souls from wandering while he looked for Death, so he asked Tigra to act as a "soul vessel" for them. That meant the souls had to be transferred into her womb. Strange said that once he found Death, he would remove the souls.

That was 12 months ago. Tigra, or anyone for that matter, hadn't heard from Strange since. And he was the only one who could remove these souls. So until he got back, she was stuck with 16 souls in her womb.

Tigra looked down, and was greeted by a wall of flesh. Her breasts had swollen to about ZZ-Cups and had burst out of her bikini top, so she had to get a new one. Her hips and thighs had also swollen to accommidate her, so she needed a new bikini bottom too. But what dominated her frame was her belly. It was the size of a yoga ball and incredibly heavy. Strange had used a spell to give Tigra the strength to move, but it was still heavy.

Tigra groaned as she heaved her massive body to the side to try and get out of bed. Carefully, she lifted herself up and slowly waddled to the door, which had been widened so she could leave. Not wanting to be stuck in bed, she decided to go to the...
1153312113222311.title: Vessal of Souls

11533121132223113.content:
As much as her current condition annoyed her, Tigra did have to admit that it had one good thing about it: she had a lot more free time now. Everyone else was on missions most of time, so she had the mansion to herself. So she decided to do something she usually couldn't do since she was on missions: use the pool.

Despite the stereotype of cats hating water, tigers, and by extension Tigra, were able to swim. And with her current condition, the pool was the only place where Tigra could feel like she was actually light. So, careful not to break anything with her belly, Tigra slowly made her way to the pool. Thankfully, the doors were incredibly wide, just in case Hulk or Thing paid a visit.

Eventually, she made it to the spacious pool. Slowly, she lowered herself into the cool water. Now, she had more free movement, since she was much lighter in the water. She decided to simply lie back and relax, rubbing her belly from time to time. The souls were oddly calm today. She started to doze off when she suddenly heard a voice.

"Hey Tigra."

Snapping her eyes open, she manuvered herself to see who it was. Standing on the other side of the pool was...
11533121132223113.title: Some Cats CAN Swim. Who Knew?

115331211322231131.content:
Tigra smiled when she saw the Jade Giantess. She-Hulk was one of her best friends. She had helped Tigra many times during this whole soul problem.

Carefully, Tigra climbed out of the pool, trying not to hit the sides with her belly. Then she walked over to where Jen was standing.

"Hey Jen." Tigra said as soon as she was close. "This is a nice surprise. I thought you had a case today."

"It got delayed. Absorbing Man smashed up the court house trying to get to me. I stopped him, but it's going to take a while before the court house can be fixed." Jen explained.

"Oh. Sorry to hear that." Tigra replied as she slowly lowered herself into a pool chair. She motioned to the chair next to her. "You want to sit down?"

Jen shrugged and sat in the other chair. "So, how are you doing? You look like you've grown again."

"I did. Three inches. Pretty soon, I'll be too big to fit through doors. Can't wait to get these souls out. Speaking of which, have you heard anything about Doctor Strange or Death yet?" Tigra asked.

"Nothing. Every lead we do get is a dead end." Jen replied.

Tigra sighed and rubbed her massive belly. Then she threw her hands up. "It's been twelve months! There should have been something!" She yelled angrily.

"Greer, calm down. We're trying." Jen said.

"Sorry. Mood swings." Tigra replied. She then put her hands on her belly. "Hey, this is going to be an odd request, but could you give me a belly rub? I need something to calm down."

"I don't see why not." Jen replied. Then she got up, walked in front of Tigra, and started rubbing her belly. This made Tigra purr.

"Thanks. That feels so good." She said happily.

Just then, however...

Suddenly, the com link in Batgirls ear snapped to life "Miss Gordon, it would appear a silent alarm has been tripped in your vicinity. Would you be so kind as to see what's the matter?" came the voice of Alfred Pennyworth, Batman's butler and trusted confidant.

121331211.content:
"On my way Alfred." Batgirl says as she heads over to the crime scene.

After making her way inside, Batgirl stalked quietly into the labratory, looking for any signs of criminal activity. As she heads deeper inside, she hears a soft moan coming from inside a brightly lit room.

Looking up at the sign, her eyes widen "Advanced Genetics? *Gasp* They have dna samples of half the Justice League in there!"

Peering inside, she sees a man in a lab coat loading blood samples into odd looking canisters the size of a tube of lipstick.

"Excuse me, is everything alright sir? I had a report that the silent alarm was tripped." She said, standing up.

The man freezes "Uh yeah, one of the lab mice must be loose, but we're fine. We're all fine here, now, thank you. How are you?" came a muffled voice that sounded quite nervous.

Batgirl's eyes narrow "First, everyone and there mom knows that line. Second, since when do you need a gas mask to work with blood samples?" she said, going for a baterang.

The man sighed and turned around. He was 5'10, had brown hair, but his face was covered by an odd looking gas mask. "I thought it was funny. Anywho, I'm Dr.Impregnus, a pleasure Batgirl. Or it will be, to see if motherhood really does suit you." He said, whipping out a gun and firing it at her.

She gasps and tries to dive out of the way, but she's hit in the abdomen by a sickly green light.

So boys and girls, was the good(-ish) doctors gun set to stun, or is Batgirl gonna need a fresh set of tights? The choice is yours!

1213312112.content:
Batgirl grunts as she feels an odd swelling pressure in her abdomen. She undoes her utility belt and falls backwards, the pressure growing even more. The to her shock and horror, she watches as her costume begins to bulge outward, her stomach rapidly growing in size with no signs of stopping.

"Congratulations! It's a boy! Well, maybe, the gun was set to multiples so odds are good at least one of them's a boy. Anywho, love to stay and chat but my work here is pretty much done and I got to knock up a super hero so I'm gonna call it a night. Take care of yourself, get plenty of rest and I suggest for any unsightly stretch marks. Chao." Impregnus chides as he runs past Batgirl and out the lab.

Batgirl made a weak grab or mad scientist but he was more than able to dodge her. When the pressure subsided, Barbra looked down at her now exceptionally large stomach. It looked as if she'd swallowed a beach ball whole. Batgirl moaned as a wave of exhaustion hit her. Before she passed out, she looked over and found the source of the noise that initially drew her here in the first place. A female lab tech was sitting in the corner, her stomach just as large if not bigger than hers. With the last of her strength, she hit the panic button on her batbelt before collapsing into unconsciousness.

12532221.content:
Zatana, mistress of magic, was performing at a fundraiser for a new Fertility Clinic in Gotham City. She had just made he assistant vanish from a fairly standard sword cabinet, and was ready to make him reappear.

"Well folks, as nice as it is to have some peace and quiet for a change, I don't think the Temp agency will react well to me loosing another assistant." She joked, some people in the crowd chuckling. Wrapping on the side of the box, she gives a loud shout of "Abra Kadabra!"

The box flew open and out stepped a man in a white lab coat, dark red shirt, black slacks and boots with his face covered by an odd looking gas mask.

"Tada! The assistant has been transformed into a supervillain! Good evening ladies and gentlemen, I am Doctor Impregnus, and I'm here with a once in a life time opportunity." the man says, the croud gasping and rising from their chairs, only to find their servers were all suddenly armed with pistols.

'It's that lunatic that knocked up Batgirl and the others. Maybe if I play it cool for a bit I can learn what his game is.' Zatana thinks, standing off too the side.

"Now I realize this is a shock, but it's also a blessing in disguise! You see, I'm offering all the lovely ladies in the audience a chance to have their own bundle of super powered joy." the mad doctor spouts with psychotic glee in his voice.

"What are you talking about you quack?" a woman in the audience jeers.

"Excellent question, though the quack comment is a bit harsh. You see, I have a ray gun that through the miracles of science, is imbued with the DNA of some of the earths mightiest heroes. This allows me to use said DNA to create multiple super babies in a lucky ladies womb and for a small fee of five million dollars, you can become pregnant with your own set of super triplets. There's a bank account number on the bottom of the tacky little table topper in front of you, transfer the money, and step on up."

Another woman looks up at him "How do we know this isn't a trick? Can you give us a demonstration?"

Impregnus nods "Another good question, and yes I can! For my first trick, I'll be needing a volunteer, and I just happen to have a magician in my midst!" he said, pointing the ray gun at Zatana.

"Fat chance psycho. sdnib otni snopaeW!" She shouts out. Suddenly, a bright light flashed and all the henchmens weapons were transformed into chains that bound them tight...except for Impregnus.

"Ooh, nice try, but I know that hoo-doo that you do and luckily for me, this isn't a weapon, it's a medical tool." he said, pullingte trigger and hitting Zatana with a sickly green light.
